analyzed: adhyaya pada

sevante yat padam dhīrāḥ tam bhajevallabham śriyaḥ

original: vairāgyārthe gatyādinirūpaṇā prathamapāda ityadhyāyapādapratipādyaṃ bhāṣya eva sphuṭam /

svābhāvika anyathā nāma sahābhāva anyathā uktayaḥ

original: aviśeṣo viśeṣau ca sahabhāvo vimiśratā // MAnuv_3,1.1 //

pūrvapakṣasya siddhāntasya iti jātau ekavacanam
sādhakāḥ iti chāndasaḥ nirdeśaḥ

original: yadvā yuktayaḥ pūrvapakṣasyetyatra sādhakā iti nyakṛṣṭate /

na tu kvācitkaḥ tad abhāvaḥ pi

original: yadi ca kvacid bījādisambandhābhāvaḥ syāttadā'kasmikatvaṃ syādityata āha- bījeti //
analyzed: yadi ca kvacid bīja ādi sambandha abhāvaḥ syāt tadā ākasmika tvam syāt iti atas āha bīja iti
yoneḥ śarīram
bījā pūruṣa yonīnām saṅga ati niyama ujkhitim
athaśabdena bhagavān āha
bīja śabdena vrīhi ādikam retaḥ ca ucyate
saṅgati niyama ujkhitim sambandha ati niyama abhāvam
ayam arthaḥ
tha iti pūrva sūtrāt atha śabdaḥ tra api anuvartate
sa ca prakṛtāt arthāt artha antare vartate
tathā ca yoneḥ śarīram āpadyate
kvacid tad abhāvena api iti atha śabdena bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ bīja ādi sambandhe ni
ndha niyama abhāvam sūtritavān iti atas na utsūtra tva paryanuyogaḥ yuktaḥ iti
yat uktam evam sati ākasmika tva prasaṅgaḥ iti tat pariharati kāraṇataḥ ca iti
kāraṇataḥ ca tām
tām ca bīja ādi sambandha niyama ujkhitim kāraṇāt āha
etat uktam bhavati
janma kāraṇa adṛṣṭa ākṛṣṭaḥ jantuḥ bīja ādi sambandhena śarīram āpadyate iti utsargaḥ
sa ca kvacid jñāna tapaḥ yoga ādi atiśaya lakṣaṇena kāraṇa viśeṣaṇā apodyate
yathā kṣudra jantu yātanā śarīra utpattau apavādaḥ iti
tathā ca uktam
viśeṣa kāraṇāt eva viśeṣāt janiḥ iṣyate
sāmānya jananam ca eva nṛṇām sāmānya hetutaḥ iti
atas yuktam etat vayākhyānam iti
iti śrīmat pūrṇapramati bhagavat pāda su kṛteḥ anuvyākhyānasya praguṇa jayatīrtha ākhya yatinā

original: kṛtāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ viṣamapadavākyārthavivṛtau tṛtīye 'dhyāye 'yaṃ prathamacaraṇaḥ paryavasitaḥ / *************************************************************************************************

original: ato 'rthajñānarūpā svāpnāvasthā neśvarādhīneti prāpte tatpratividhānāyopodghātamāha- vāsanā iti //
analyzed: atas ṛtha jñāna rūpā svāpna avasthā na īśvara adhīnā iti prāpte tad pratividhānāya upodghātam āha vāsanāḥ iti
saṃdhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi
nirmātāram ca eke putra ādayaḥ ca
māyā mātram tu kārtsnyena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt
vāsanāḥ sarva vastūnām anādi anubhava āgatāḥ
santi eva aśeṣa jīvānām anādi manasi sthitāḥ
bhāvanā apara nāmakāḥ saṃskārāḥ
sarva grahaṇa prayojanam uttaratra bhaviṣyati
nanu bhāvanā ākhya saṃskāraḥ nubhava janyaḥ

tat katham aśeṣa jīvānām sarva vastu vāsanāḥ santi eva iti atas uktam anādi iti
anādi anubhava pravāha utpannāḥ

original: sādito manasaḥ kathamanādivāsanāsambandha ityata uktam- anādīti // *9,27*
analyzed: sāditaḥ manasaḥ katham anādi vāsanā sambandhaḥ iti atas uktam anādi iti
etat eva prapañcayati triguṇa ātmakam iti
triguṇa ātmakam mano sti eva yāvat muktiḥ sadātanam
tatra eva aśeṣa saṃskārāḥ sañcīyante sadā eva ca

original: manasa eva saṃskārāśrayatvaṃ nātmana itayatropapattisūcanāya triguṇātmakamityuktam /
analyzed: manasaḥ eva saṃskāra āśraya tvam na ātmanaḥ iti yatra upapatti sūcanāya triguṇa ātmakam iti uktam
guṇa ātmakam iti eva ukte parimāṇa ādi guṇa ātmakam iti api pratītiḥ syāt
tad ātmanaḥ pi samānam iti atas tri grahaṇam
tathā ca jīvātmā na bhāvanā āśrayaḥ sattva ādi guṇa anātmaka tvāt īśvara vat
bhāvanā vā sattva ādi guṇa ātmaka dravya āśrayā saṃskāra tvāt vega ādi vat
tat ca pariśeṣāt manaḥ eva iti uktam bhavati
sattva ādi guṇān abhyupagantāram prati tu tad sthāne cetana padam prayoktavyam
triguṇa ātmaka grahaṇam ca
svarūpa kathanam
asti eva sarva daiveti dā iti śeṣaḥ

original: tathā sati mokṣe 'pi sattvātsvapnādyavasthāpattirityata uktaṃ vivṛṇoti- yāvaditi //

original: yadyapi manaḥ svarūpeṇa nityameva tathāpi jīvasambandhastasya mokṣāvadhirityata idamuktam /

original: tadvai jaivaṃ mano yenānandyeta bhavatīti sūktāvapyātmano manaḥsambandhaśravaṇātkathaṃ yāvanmuktirityuktamityato vā triguṇātmakamityuktam /

ātma svarūpa manasaḥ muktau sattve pi jaḍa manaḥ bhipretya ayam avadhiḥ uktaḥ iti

original: svapnakāla eva sṛṣṭvetyanena prāgūrdhvaṃ copalambhaprasaṅgo nirākṛtaḥ /

original: asti tāvadbādhitaviṣayatvasya dūṣaṇatve kṛśānuśaityādisādhanaṃ kṛtakatvādikaṃ doṣāntarāsaṅkīrṇamudāharaṇam /

tena
tasya dūṣaṇa tvam niśninumaḥ
na ca āsāt āśraya tvasya doṣa tve bādhita viṣaya tva ādi asaṅkīrṇam udāharaṇam asti
yena tasya doṣa tvam pratīmaḥ
dṛśyate ca tathāvidhasya hetu tvam
yathā vandhyā sutaḥ na vaktā acetana tvāt pāṣāṇa vat iti
atas bādhita viṣaya tvena eva śṛṅga tvam asādhanam na asat āśraya tvena iti niścīyate
atha matam
vandhyā sutaḥ vaktā suta tvāt sammata vat iti sat pratipakṣam etat kim na syāt
asat āśraya tā bhayasya bhavatā eva tyājita tvāt iti
mā evam

dharmāṇām anekavidha tvāt
kecid hi dharmi samavetāḥ bhavanti

kecid anya samavetāḥ api anyam uparañjanīyam

yathā bhāvaḥ

na ca evam sva vacana vyāghātaḥ

atha acetana tvam api asiddham

abhāvasya ca asataḥ tā
nirūpaṇam upapadyate iti uktam

original: amūkatvena viśeṣaṇe tasya vaktṛtvānatiriktatvena sādhyaviśiṣyatā syāt /

original: tathāpi vidhāyakānāṃ vidhirūpāṇāṃ cāśrayeṇāvaśyaṃ pratyakṣāgamagṛhītena bhāvyam /

original: yata evaṃ, tasmādamūlāḥ svamūlabhūtapratyakṣāgamaviruddhā nyāyābhāsā eva syuḥ /

original: naiśatyādisampanno 'pi paraśuraviṣaye gaganādau na chidāṃ janayati evamanumānānyapyupajīvyatvādinā

pratyakṣa āgama mūlāt nyāyāt anyasya api nyāyasya tau pratyakṣa āgamau eve mūlam

original: yato mūlabhūtasyāpyanyasya nyāyasya tau punarmūlamityantataḥ sarvathā pratyakṣāgamānatikramāttathoktamiti /

original: yadyapyāgamo 'pi pratyakṣamūlastathāpi kvacitpratyakṣasyāpi mūlaṃ bhavatītyato dvayorgrahaṇam /

original: adṛṣṭe vyabhicāre tu sādhakaṃ taditi sphuṭam /

māna bādhe na tat bhavet

original: pramāṇabādhenāgnyādeḥ śaityādyapahāre sati tatraiva liṅgasya kṛtakatvādeḥ sādhyavyabhicāradarśanāt /

tat anena vyāpti bhaṅga hetutayā bādhasya dūṣaṇa tvam iti uktam bhavati

original: tasya cāyathārthatvaṃ bādhenāvedyate ityata āha- amānasyeti //

original: syāttadā vimataṃ bhojanamiṣyasādhanaṃ bhojanatvāt hyastanabhojanavadityanumānamamānaṃ prasajyeteti /

analyzed: pratyagra śarāva cakra bhrama darśanena kulāla āsatti anumānam ca āśaṅkaya kenacid uktam na uttara deśaḥ pakṣaḥ kinnāma nadī
tad dharmeṇa eva pūreṇa
tad dharmasya vṛṣṭimat uttara deśa sambandhasya sādhya tvam
evam śarāva cakra dharmābhyām pratyagra tva bhramābhyām tad dharmasya eva kulāla āsatteḥ anumānam iti
atas idam udāharaṇa antaram uditam
nahi tathā iha

original: treveha rohiṇyāḥ kṛttikāyā vā dvau dharmau sampādayituṃ śakyau /
analyzed: trā iva iha rohiṇyāḥ kṛttikāyāḥ vā dvau dharmau sampādayitum śakyau
nanu iha api kālam pakṣīkṛtya prayoktavyam
vimataḥ kālaḥ rohiṇī udaya āsattimān kṛttikā udayavat kāla tvāt atīta kāla vat iti

original: (maivam) evaṃ sati deśaṃ kālaṃ vā'dāya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya sarvatra sattvādvayadhikaraṇāsiddha eva na syāditi vyarthaṃ tatparisaṅkhayānam /
analyzed: mā evam evam sati deśam kālam vā ādāya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya sarvatra sattvāt vayadhikaraṇa asiddhaḥ eva na syāt iti vyartham tat parisaṅkhayānam
evam aprayoge vyadhikaraṇa tvam sa avakāśam iti ced na
tathā satya siddheḥ ukti doṣa tva abhāva prasaṅgāt
na ca ukti doṣa tvam api
vyadhikaraṇa tayā ukteḥ api sādhya siddhayaṅgatva anubhavāt
evam eva hi laukikānām uktayaḥ
parīkṣakāḥ api hi tat prāmāṇyam apāta prāmāṇyāt
ityādi prayujyate
tat idam uktam iti vyadhikaraṇa tayā ukte pi etat vākyam
sādhanam sādhya sidhi aṅgam no kim bhavati eva iti

naiyāyika ādi samayaḥ niyāmakaḥ kiṃvā atra
pramāṇam asti
ādyam dūṣayati na hi iti

atra upapatti siddhe rthe
sādhye rthe
ājñā eva samaya mātram
tathā sati sarvam vāc mātreṇa eva upadeṣyavyam
na punar kvāpi pramāṇam vācyam

original: viparītājñayā satpratipakṣatā ca syāditi hi śabdārthaḥ /
analyzed: viparīta ājñayā sat pratipakṣa tā ca syāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ
ājñā khalu pramāṇāt para viṣaye dharma ādau bhavati
sā ca avagata āpta bhāvānām
na api dvitīyaḥ
tad anupalambhāt
syāt etat
vyāptiḥ tāvat anumāna aṅgam

atas vyāśraya tvasya doṣa tvāt sambhatavi
te viṣaye vipariṇāmaḥ iti
mā evam
avinābhāva mātrasya vyāpti tvāt
avinābhāvaḥ ca kvacid eka āśraya tām antar bhāvya bhavati
yathā kṛtaka tvasya anitya tvena
atas eva anya gatena tena nā anyatra anitya tā siddhiḥ

yathā dhūmasya agninā

ūrdhva adhas deśa saṃyogi tvāt

tathā sati agni arthinaḥ niyamena pradeśa viśeṣe pravṛtti anupapatteḥ

original: dhūma eva dhūmatvena mūle 'gnimānsādhyata iti cet /
analyzed: dhūmaḥ eva dhūma tvena mūle gnimān sādhyate iti ced
kim eṣā laukikī pratītiḥ

na dvitīyaḥ
nirmūla tvāt

original: api ca dehādīnāṃ tāvatpareṇa kṣaṇikatā svīkriya(''sthīya)te /
analyzed: api ca deha ādīnām tāvat pareṇa kṣaṇika tā

nahi tayoḥ kālataḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam

na api deśataḥ
vibhinna dravya āśraya tvāt
atas kasyacid vibhinna āśrayeṇa eva avinābhāvaḥ

original: nanu vyadhikaraṇasya pakṣadharmatā nāstīti cenmā bhūt /

niyata deśa tā katham siddhayet iti ced vayāpti svabhāvāt iti brūmaḥ

original: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyamantarbhāvya vyāpteḥ kṛtakatvaṃ svāśraya evānityatvaṃ gamayati /

original: tathā kṛttikodayo vyadhikaraṇayaiva rohiṇyudayāsattyā vyāpta iti tau tathaiva gamayati /
analyzed: tathā kṛttikā udayaḥ vyadhikaraṇayā eva rohiṇī udaya āsattyā vyāptaḥ iti tau tathā eva gamayati

original: yathā ca sāmānādhikaraṇye 'pyasti pradeśādiniyamastathā vaiyadhikaraṇye 'pīti ko doṣaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca sāmānādhikaraṇye pi asti pradeśa ādi niyamaḥ tathā vaiyadhikaraṇye pi iti kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: tasmādyatredaṃ tatredamitivadyadedaṃ tadedamitivat yadevaṃ tadevamitivacca yadīdaṃ tarhīdamiti vyāptisambhavāt /
analyzed: tasmāt yatra idam tatra idam itivat yadā idam tadā idam itivat yat evam tat evam itivat ca yadi idam tarhi idam iti vyāpti sambhavāt
vyāpti anurodhena eva hetu siddheḥ āvaśyaka tayā pakṣa dharma tā anāvaśyaka tva ādi uktam vyadhikaraṇasya api hetu tvam iti
tathā sādhya viśeṣaṇasya aprasiddhau api
tathā hi
sādhya viśeṣaṇa śa prasiddheḥ kutas dūṣaṇa tvāt
kim viśvam sat asat vilakṣaṇam bādhya tvāt ityādeḥ api prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt
uta sādhya viśeṣaṇa aprasiddhau tad sandeha anupapattau pakṣa tva anupapatteḥ hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tva anupapatti prasakteḥ
athavā sādhya viśeṣaṇa aprasiddhau tena sādhanasya vyāpti pratīti anupapatti prasaṅgāt
yat vā pratijñā vākyasya apratīta padārthaka tvena abodhaka tva āpatteḥ
ādyam dūṣayati anyat iti
anyat sat asatoḥ viśvam iti ca vyāhateḥ amā
sat na bhavati iti ukte sattvam uktam bhavet syāt sa
sattva pratikṣepa rūpa tvāt asattvasya
punar asat na bhavati iti ukte sva vacana vyāhatiḥ

original: evamasanna bhavatītyuktyā dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayata iti sattvaṃ labhyate /
analyzed: evam asat na bhavati iti uktyā dvau nañau prakṛtam artham sa atiśayam gamayataḥ iti sattvam labhyate
punar sat na bhavati iti ukte sva vyāhatiḥ eva

original: tadevaṃ viśvaṃ sadasatoḥ sakāśādanyat sadasacca na bhavatītyeṣā pratijñā svavyāhatereva amā('pramā)
analyzed: tat evam viśvam sat asatoḥ sakāśāt anyat sat asat ca na bhavati iti eṣā pratijñā sva vyāhateḥ eva amā apramā
sādhana aṅgam na bhavati
na tu viśeṣaṇasya sat asat vailakṣaṇya lakṣaṇasya aprasiddha tvena
kutas

original: svavyāhatirhi me mātā vandhyetyādau dūṣaṇatvena sampratipannā /

sva vacana sva nyāya sva kriyā sva siddhānta pramāṇa antara apratihatāyāḥ eva ukteḥ sādhana dūṣaṇa aṅga tvāt
nahi sva viṣa vimūrchitā bhujaṅgī param daśati

original: naca doṣāntarāsaṅkīrṇaṃ sādhyaviśeṣaṇāsiddherudāharaṇaṃ paśyāmo yena doṣatvaṃ pratīmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca doṣa antara asaṅkīrṇam sādhya viśeṣaṇa asiddheḥ udāharaṇam paśyāmaḥ yena doṣa tvam pratīmaḥ

original: kasyacidasādhāraṇadharmeṇa śaśaviṣāṇādimattvasādhanamapi pramāṇaṃ kinna syāditi cenna /

original: atīndriyasaṃsagarsādhane na ko 'pi doṣa iti cenna /

īśvara ādi saṃsargeṇa siddha sādhana tvāt

atas eva vyāhateḥ iti upalakṣaṇam

original: asiddhasādhane doṣaḥ ko vyāptiryadi vidyate // MAnuv_3,2.24cd //

original: yadi vyāptyādikaṃ vidyate tadāsiddhasādhane ko doṣaḥ /

original: yadā hi yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti gṛhītavyāptiko giriśekhare dhūmaṃ paśyanvyāptiṃ smarati /

original: ataḥ (pra)śithilamūlaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vyatirekiṇaḥ kva vyāptiḥ kena cāvagamyata iti cet /

original: na kevalaṃ kevalavyatirekisādhanasya sādhyena vyāptirvyatirekeṇa tadavagamaścāsmābhirevāṅgīkriyate /

original: yadi sādhyenāsya kvacidapyanvayo nāsti tadā viruddha evāyamityāśaṅkaya nopeyatvamanvayasya vyāsedhāmo 'pi tūpā(yami)

ya tvam ityādi

original: tathā cāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasyāpi kevalavyatirekiṇo vyāptyupapādanamaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatve vyāptyapratītiprasañjanaṃ ca kathaṃ na vyāhatamiti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca aprasiddha viśeṣaṇasya api kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ vyāpti upapādanam aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tve vyāpti apratīti prasañjanam ca katham na vyāhatam iti bhāvaḥ

original: yaduktaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇo vyāptyavagamātparairabhyupagamācca nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatve 'pi vyāptyavagamātparairabhyupagamācca nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatve  #

prāṇa ādimattvena jīvat śarīrasya sātmaka tve sādhye yat yat kāryavat tat tat kāraṇavat yathā ahaṅkuravatī bhūmiḥ bīja garbhā iti

original: (ya)tathā gandhavattvena bhuvo 'nyabhedasādhane yadyadasādhāraṇadharmavattattato bhidyate yathā abādīti /

original: evamīśvarasya sarvakartṛtvena sārvajñasādhane yo yasya kartā sa tasya kāraṇaṃ prayojanaṃ ca jānāti /

yathā kulālaḥ iti
evam śabdaḥ pṛthivī ādi aṣṭa dravya atirikta dravya āśritaḥ pṛthivī ādi vṛttau bādhaka upapanna tve

original: sati guṇatvādityādau yo yadvṛttau bādhakopapannatve sati guṇaḥ sa tato 'nyadravyavṛttiryathā
analyzed: sati guṇa tvāt ityādau yaḥ yad vṛttau bādhaka upapanna tve sati guṇaḥ sa tatas nyadravya vṛttiḥ yathā
gandhaḥ ityādi rūpeṇa sāmānyataḥ vyāptiḥ abhidhātavyā

original: yadvā sāmānyato viśeṣaṇaprasiddhiṃ vidhāya kevalavyatirekī prayoktavyaḥ /

original: yathā jñānatāratamyaṃ kvacidviśrāntaṃ tāratamyatvādityanena sāmānyataḥ sārvajñasiddhau tasyeśvarasambandhaḥ kevalavyatirekiṇā sādhyate /

tathā icchā ādayaḥ kvacid āśritāḥ guṇa tvāt rūpa vat

original: yaścecchādīnāmāśrayaḥ sa evātmeti sāmānyenātmasiddhau tatsambandho jīvaccharīrasya kevalavyatirekiṇā sādhyate /

evam anyatra api yathāsambhavam ūhyam
kvacid pakṣa eka deśe eva viśeṣaṇa prasiddhim āśritya kevala vyatirekī pravartate

original: yathā pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate pṛthivītvānna yadevaṃ na tadevaṃ yathā jalādītyatra ghaṭādāveva viśeṣaṇaprasiddhernāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatā /
analyzed: yathā pṛthivī itarebhyaḥ bhidyate pṛthivī tvāt na yat evam na tat evam yathā jala ādi iti atra ghaṭa ādau eva viśeṣaṇa prasiddheḥ na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā
na ca evam sapakṣa sambhavena kevala vyatireki tva bhaṅgaḥ
ghaṭa ādeḥ pakṣa eka deśa tvāt
na ca aṃśe siddha sādhana tā
eka ekatra prasiddhau api ā paramāṇaroḥ ca bhū golakāt asiddheḥ iti
abhāvaḥ vā kevala vyatirekiṇā sādhyaḥ

original: bhāve hi pratipādye vyatirekavyāptau tadabhāvasya pratiyogipratītisāpekṣatayā viśeṣaṇaprasiddhayapekṣā /
analyzed: bhāve hi pratipādye vyatireka vyāptau tad abhāvasya pratiyogi pratīti sāpekṣa tayā viśeṣaṇa prasiddhayapekṣā
abhāve tu sādhye na ayam doṣaḥ
evam anye pi ukti viśeṣa prakārāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ
teṣu anyatamasya api abhāve prasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā dūṣaṇam eva
atas na kevala vyatireki prāmāṇyam avalambya aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā dūṣaṇa tvam nirasanīyam iti atas āha aprasiddhasya iti
aprasiddhasya sādhyasya sādhaka tvam yat ā iṣyate

original: liṅgasyoktau viśeṣo 'yaṃ kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_3,2.25c-f //
analyzed: liṅgasya uktau viśeṣaḥ yam kena mānena gamyate
sādhyasya iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī liṅgasya iti kartari
ayam iti buddhi stha parāmarśaḥ

original: bhavedetadyadyayaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇyuktiviśeṣaḥ kārya ityatra niyāmakaṃ syāt /
analyzed: bhavet etat yadi ayam kevala vyatirekiṇī ukti viśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ iti atra niyāmakam syāt
na ca etat asti
tathā hi

original: kimanenoktiviśeṣeṇa kevalavyatirekisādhyamanvayitāṃ nīyata uta neti vaktavyam /
analyzed: kim anena ukti viśeṣeṇa kevala vyatireki sādhyam anvayi tām nīyate uta na iti vaktavyam
na ādyaḥ
ukteḥ artha tathātva parivartaka tva asambhavāt
nahi sahasreṇa api uktīnām naraḥ vānarīkartum śakyate
śakya tve vā kevala vyatireki prāmāṇyam tyaktam syāt
dvitīyasya idam uktam
yadā liṅgasya aprasiddhasya sādhyasya sādhaka tvam iṣyate

original: yadyuktiviśeṣaṇāpi liṅgaṃ kevalavyatirekisādhyasādhakameva nānvayitāmāpadyata itīṣyata iti yāvat /
analyzed: yadi ukti viśeṣaṇā api liṅgam kevala vyatireki sādhya sādhakam eva na anvayi tām āpadyate iti iṣyate iti yāvat

original: tadāyamuktau viśeṣaḥ kena mānena kartavyatayā jñāyate na kenāpi /
analyzed: tadā ayam uktau viśeṣaḥ kena mānena kartavya tayā jñāyate na kena api

original: ato 'prasiddhaviśeṣaṇa eva kevalavyatirekī sādhakaśceti nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvasya doṣatvamiti /
analyzed: prasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ eva kevala vyatirekī sādhakaḥ ca iti na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvasya doṣa tvam iti
asti eva ukti viśeṣasya kartavya tāyām niyāmakam
tathā hi
yadi api ukti viśeṣaḥ na vyatirekiṇam anvayinam karoti
tathā api liṅgasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ tāvat aśyambhāvinī
na ca sā kevala vyatirekiṇi sākṣāt uparśayitum śakyā
anvaya grahaṇa sthalasya vipratipattyā pratiruddha tvāt

original: ataḥ sādhyavyatirekasya sādhanavyatirekeṇa vipakṣe vyāptiṃ pradarśyopapādanīyā / *9,130*
analyzed: atas sādhya vyatirekasya sādhana vyatirekeṇa vipakṣe vyāptim pradarśya upapādanīyā  /
yadi vā vyatireka vyāptiḥ eva sādhya siddheḥ aṅgam
tathā api tad grahaḥ vaśyambhāvī
vyatirekaḥ ca pratiyogi pratīti adhīna pratītikaḥ eva
pratiyoginau ca liṅga sādhya dharmau
tatra liṅgam pakṣe pratītam eva
sādhya dharmaḥ ca na pakṣe pratītaḥ na api anyatra
tat katham vyatirekayoḥ api vyāptiḥ gṛhyatām

original: etaistūktiviśeṣaiḥ kathañcitpratiyoginaḥ sādhyadharmasya buddhisthatāyāṃ sukaro vyāptigrahaḥ syāt / *9,131*
analyzed: etaiḥ tu ukti viśeṣaiḥ kathañcid pratiyoginaḥ sādhya dharmasya buddhi stha tāyām sukaraḥ vyāpti grahaḥ syāt

original: pratijñāvākyaṃ caivamaviditapadārthakaṃ na prasajyata ityata āha- sādhanamiti //
analyzed: pratijñā vākyam ca evam avidita padārthakam na prasajyate iti atas āha sādhanam iti
sādhanam paramāṇu ādeḥ yat āsiddhasya ca iṣyate
yathānubhavam eva etat na aṅgīkāryam kutas tadā
paramāṇu kārakatām kāryāṇām abhyupagacchatā vaiśeṣika ādinā paramāṇu sadbhāvaḥ sādhyate
tathā pradhāna upādāna tām vadatā sāṅkhayena pradhāna sadbhāvaḥ
evam anyat api samavāya ādikam tad aṅgīkāribhiḥ samarthyate
tatra pṛcchāmaḥ

original: yaḥ paramāṇvādikamabhyupaiti taṃ prati tatsadbhāvaḥ sādhyate,
analyzed: yaḥ paramāṇu ādikam abhyupaiti tam prati tad sadbhāvaḥ sādhyate

original: uta na santi paramāṇava iti tadabhāvamabhyupagacchantaṃ prati /
analyzed: uta na santi paramāṇavaḥ iti tad abhāvam abhyupagacchantam prati
na ādyaḥ
siddhasya sādhana ayogāt

original: dvitīye tvabuddhayārūḍhasya paramāṇvādeḥ sādhanāya kathaṃ vādinaḥ prayatnaḥ kathaṃ ca tadabhāvaṃ paro manyeta /
analyzed: dvitīye tu abuddhayā ārūḍhasya paramāṇu ādeḥ sādhanāya katham vādinaḥ prayatnaḥ katham ca tad abhāvam paraḥ manyeta
pratiyoginaḥ vidita tvāt
atha manyase kaṇāda ādi upadeśena

original: sāmānyato dṛṣṭasvārthānumānena vā svayamavagataṃ paramāṇvādikaṃ vādinā śakyata eva sādhayitum /
analyzed: sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sva artha anumānena vā svayam avagatam paramāṇu ādikam vādinā śakyate eva sādhayitum
vādi vākyena ca pratiyoginaḥ paramāṇu ādeḥ avagame
bhimatiḥ prativādinaḥ yuktā eva

original: nahi pramāṇenaiva pratiyogī jñātavya iti niyamo 'sti śaśaviṣāṇādyabhāvapratītyānupapattiprasaṅgāditi /
analyzed: nahi pramāṇena eva pratiyogī jñātavyaḥ iti niyamaḥ sti śaśaviṣāṇa ādi abhāva pratītyā anupapatti prasaṅgāt iti
yadi evam atyanta aprasiddhasya api paramāṇu ādeḥ anubhava mārgam an atikramya sādhanam iṣyate
tadā etat vayatireki sādhya sādhanam api anubhava anusāreṇa eva kutas nā aṅgīkāryam
tathā hi
pratyakṣeṇa upadeśena

original: ṇau dharmāvekatropalabdhavatastato 'nyatra savartrāpi tadabhāvopalambhasambhave vyatirekavyāptigrahastāvadvādinaḥ sukara eva /
analyzed: ṇau dharmau ekatra upalabdhavataḥ tatas nyatra savartrā api tad abhāva upalambha sambhave vyatireka vyāpti grahaḥ tāvadvādinaḥ sukaraḥ eva
prativādinaḥ pi vādi vākya avagata pratiyoginaḥ tad abhāva avagama sambhavāt
vyatireka vyāpti grahaḥ sambhavati eva

original: tathāca prāguktarītyānvayasamarthanena aprasiddhasādhyasādhane sambhavati kimetābhiḥ kliṣyakalpanābhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca prāgukta rītyā anvaya samarthanena aprasiddha sādhya sādhane sambhavati kim etābhiḥ kliṣya kalpanābhiḥ
evam ca na pratijñā vākyasya avidita padārthaka tva prasaṅgaḥ
vādinā tad arthasya vyutpādita tva ādya tvāt iti
upasaṃharati yatra iti
yatra na atiprasaṅgaḥ sti mānam na ca viparyate
kliṣṭa kalpanayā eva atra sādhyam iti ati durvacaḥ
viṣaye kevala vyatirekiṇi
evam sāmānya anvavamanva

original: yābhidhānādinā sādhanaṃ kāryamiti niyāmakaṃ (mānaṃ vā) nāsti /
analyzed: yā abhidhāna ādinā sādhanam kāryam iti niyāmakam mānam vā nā asti
vyāpti pratīti ādeḥ anyathā asiddha tvāt
ṛjunā anubhava anusāriṇā mārgeṇa siddhayataḥ rthasya vakreṇa an ānubhāvikena sādhana ayogāt
viparyaye tathā sādhana akaraṇe
atiprasaṅgaḥ ca na asti
sva vyāhati ādinā eva aparasya ābhāsa tvāt
atra kliṣya kalpanayā eva sādhya sādhanam kāryam iti ati duṣyam vākyam iti

original: anena viśiṣyavyatirekamāśritya yā mahāvidyādivakrarītiḥ sāpyapāstā veditavyā /
analyzed: anena viśiṣya vyatirekam āśritya yā mahāvidyā ādivakra rītiḥ sā api apāstā veditavyā
bhavet etat yadi kevala vyatireki anumānam bhavet
na ca evam

original: pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣādvayāvṛttirabādhitaviṣayatvamasatpratipakṣatvaṃ ceti pañcarūpopapannaṃ khalvanumānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tvam sapakṣe sattvam vipakṣa advaya āvṛttiḥ abādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam ca iti pañca rūpa upapannam khalu anumānam bhavati
na ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ tat asti
sapakṣa abhāvena sapakṣe sattva abhāvāt
na ca evam vipakṣa abhāvena vipakṣa advaya āvṛtteḥ abhāvāt ananumāna tva prasaṅgaḥ iti vācyam
anvaya vyatirekavataḥ eva anumāna tvena aniṣya abhāvāt iti
dvitīyam āśaṅkayā āha pariśeṣaḥ iti
asiddha sādhaka tvena pañcāvayavatām vinā
aṅgīkāryāḥ samastaiḥ
prasakta pratiṣedhe pariśiṣyamāṇe buddhiḥ pariśeṣaḥ
dvayoḥ paraspara apekṣayā utpattiḥ jñaptiḥ vā mithas siddhiḥ
bahūnām cakra vat itaretara apekṣayā utpatti ādikam cakrakam
sva apekṣam sva utpatti ādi sva āśrayaḥ
ādi padena anavasthā
sā ca anavasthita asiddha utpādaka ādi paramparā apekṣā
asiddha sādhaka tvena hetunā
pañca avayava tām pañca rūpa upapanna tām
aṅgīkāryāḥ anumāna tvena samastaiḥ vādibhiḥ

original: na khalu ko 'pi vādī pariśeṣādīnanādṛtya parīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtto 'sti /
analyzed: na khalu kaḥ pi vādī pariśeṣa ādīn an ādṛtya parīkṣāyām pravṛttaḥ sti
etat uktam bhavati
pariśeṣa ādīni tāvat anumānāni
vyāpya jñānāt vayāpaka jñānam iti tad lakṣaṇa ākrānta tvāt
pramāṇa prapañca rucibhiḥ api anumānāt bahirbhāvena tad prāmāṇyasya anabhyupagata tvāt ca
tāni ca asiddhasya eva sādhyasya sādhakāni

original: śabdasya hi pṛthivyādyaṣṭasaṃsarge pratiṣiddhe pariśeṣāttadatiriktadravyāśritatvaṃ siddhayati /
analyzed: śabdasya hi pṛthivī ādi aṣṭa saṃsarge pratiṣiddhe pariśeṣāt tad atirikta dravya āśrita tvam siddhayati
na ca prāk ākāśa siddheḥ pṛthivī ādi atiriktam dravyam siddham
yena tad āśrita tva kvacid prasiddham syāt

original: yat yasya kāryaṃ pramitaṃ pareṇāṅgīkṛtaṃ vā tasya tatkāryatāmaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ prati mithaḥsiddhirucyate /
analyzed: yat yasya kāryam pramitam pareṇa aṅgīkṛtam vā tasya tad kārya tām aṅgīkurvāṇam prati mithas siddhiḥ ucyate
na ca sā kvacid prasiddhā
dvayoḥ api paraspara apekṣayā pūrva bhāvi tvam tve
sā iti pakṣe pi tathā
etena cakrakam vyākhyātam
asya eva ghaṭasya
gacchantam prati sva āśraya tvam abhidhīyate
tat ca svasya eva sva apekṣayā pūrva bhāvi tvam paścāt bhāvi tvam ca aprasiddham eva
asiddhasya eva kāraṇatām bruvāṇam prati anavasthā ucyate
na ca kvacid kārye nava sthita asiddha kāraṇa paramparā siddhā
sāmānyatas prasiddhiḥ tu kevala vyatirekiṇī api samānā
asiddha sādhaka tvena ca eṣām pañca rūpa upapanna tā nā asti
tathā ca anumānānām api eṣām pañca rūpa upapanna tva abhāvāt
vyatireki na anumānam pañca rūpa upanna tā
patau aidhuryāt iti anaikāntikam iti
dūṣaṇa antaram āha tad niyame iti
tad niyamaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ
anumāne pañca rūpa upapanna tā niyamasya nirnibandhana tvāt atādṛśasya api anumāna tve bādhaka abhāvāt ca aprayojakaḥ yam hetvābhāsaḥ
nanu epām rūpāṇām vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā aupāyika tvāt asiddha yādi hetvābhāsa pañcakasya
vyudāsa artha tvāt ca katham nirnibandhana tva tā
katham ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvaḥ
ukta prayojana asiddheḥ eva bādhaka tvāt

original: sapakṣe sattvaṃ vināpyanumānatve bhūrnityā gandhavattvādityāderasādhāraṇasyāpyanumānatvaṃ syāditi cenna /
analyzed: sapakṣe sattvam vinā api anumāna tve bhūḥ nityā gandhavat tvāt ityādeḥ asādhāraṇasya api anumāna tvam syāt iti ced na
sapakṣa sadbhāva asadbhāvābhyām bheda siddheḥ iti
evam āśraya asiddhayā ādeḥ adūṣaṇa tvam upapādya yat uktam parihare siddha tvam dūṣaṇam
iti tat ayuktam
vāde nigrahasthāna abhāvasya ukta tvāt iti āśaṅkām pariharati siddha iti
siddasādhana tāyām ca na kathā avasitiḥ bhavet

original: yathā siddhapraśnādau na vādakathāvasitirbhavet kintu tattvanirṇayavirodhitvādudbhāvya tyājanīyameva /
analyzed: yathā siddhapraśna ādau na vāda kathā avasitiḥ bhavet kintu tattva nirṇaya virodhi tvāt udbhāvya tyājanīyam eva
evam siddha sādhanatāyām ca iti arthaḥ
tad anyasya siddha tā eva hi sādhikā
iti anena hetoḥ vyāpti asiddhiḥ svarūpa asiddhiḥ ca dūṣaṇam iti sūcitam
tatra kecid ācakṣate
dvividham vyāpti abhāva ādikam
vādi prativādinoḥ anyatara matena ubhaya matena ca iti
anye tu manyante
anyatara avyāpti ādikam nāma na asti eva
vastu vikalpa asambhavāt iti
tatra kim tattvam iti ākāṅkṣāyām āha vyabhicāraḥ iti
vyabhicāraḥ hetu asiddhiḥ eka pakṣe dūṣaṇam
atra vyabhicāraḥ iti avyāpti mātra upalakṣaṇam

original: na kevalamubhayapakṣe kintu vādiprativādinorekasya pakṣe 'pi vyabhicāro hetvasiddhiśca hetordūṣaṇameva /
analyzed: na kevalam ubhaya pakṣe kintu vādi prativādinoḥ ekasya pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ hetu asiddhiḥ ca hetoḥ dūṣaṇam eva

original: yadyapi vastuto 'nyataravyabhicārādikaṃ na sambhavati tathāpi prāgvastutattvāvadhāraṇādābhimānikaṃ sambhavatyeva /
analyzed: yadi api vastutaḥ nyatara vyabhicāra ādikam na sambhavati tathā api prāk vastu tattva avadhāraṇāt ābhimānikam sambhavati eva
tathāca hetu sāmarthya sandehe pi ahetu tvam āvaśyakam eva
vyāpti ādi nimittayā niścitasya eva hetu tvāt iti
tad anyasya iti anena dṛṣṭāntasya api sādhya ādimattvena asiddhiḥ dūṣaṇam iti sūcitam
kecid ācakṣate

original: dṛṣṭāntadoṣā nāma na santi teṣāṃ yathāyogaṃ hetudoṣeṣvevāntarbhūtatvāditi /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ nāma na santi teṣām yathāyogam hetu doṣeṣu eva antarbhūta tvāt iti
tān pratyāha sādhyā iti
sādhya sādhana vaikalyam dṛṣṭāntasya
dūṣaṇam iti vartate
sādhya vaikalya ādeḥ hetvābhāsa antarbhāve pi dṛṣṭānta āśraya tayā spaṣṭa pratibhāsa tvāt
pratibhāsa anusāreṇa evā udbhāvya tvāt udbhāvana artha tvāt ca vyutpādanasya dṛṣṭānta doṣa tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ
dṛṣṭānta doṣān ca kecid aṣṭau ācakṣate
sādhya vaikalyam sādhana vaikalyam ubhaya vaikalyam āśraya hīna tvam iti catvāraḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ
sādhya avyāvṛttiḥ sādhana avyāvṛttiḥ ubhaya avyāvṛttiḥ āśraya hīna tvam iti catvāraḥ vaidhamyaḥ ṛdṣṭānta doṣāḥ iti
tat na iti āha sādhyā iti
siddhe sati ārambhaḥ niyama arthaḥ
sādhya sādhana vaikalyam eva dṛṣṭāntasya dūṣaṇam na aparam iti arthaḥ
tathā hi
ubhaya vaikalyam tāvat pṛthak na vācyam
ekaika vaikalyena eva dṛṣṭāntasya duṣṭa tve samudita kalpanā vaiyarthyāt

original: sambhavamātreṇa pṛthagvacane 'naikāntikakālatītatvaṃ nāma hetvābhāsāntaraṃ vācyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sambhava mātreṇa pṛthak vacane na aikāntika kāla atīta tvam nāma hetvābhāsa antaram vācyam syāt
āśraya hīna tvam ca āśraya siddhi samānam
vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma na asti eva iti prāk eva prapañcitam iti

original: yadvā dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyasādhanavaikalyamapi vyabhicārāsivadubhayānyatararītyā dvividhaṃ pratipattavya na punarekavidhameva /
analyzed: yat vā dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya sādhana vaikalyam api vyabhicāra asi vat ubhaya anyatara rītyā dvividham na punar ekavidham eva
abhimānataḥ dvaividhyasya api sambhavāt iti āha sādhya iti
eka pakṣe dūṣaṇam iti anuvartate
hetoḥ vyartha viśeṣaṇa tvam vyartha viśeṣya tvam ca na dūṣaṇam
vyāpti pakṣa dharma tayoḥ apratihateḥ iti kecid
tān pratyāha viśeṣaṇe iti

original: viśeṣaṇe datte sati yadvaiyarthyaṃ viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇasya vā tadapi hetordūṣaṇameva /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇe datte sati yat vaiyarthyam viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇasya vā tat api hetoḥ dūṣaṇam eva
vyāpti upayogi tayā hi hetau viśeṣaṇam upadīyate
vaiyarthye tu viśiṣyasya vyāpya tva abhāvāt yuktam tasya
hetu doṣa tvam iti
yat vā siddha praśna ādikam iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt ādhikya antargatam etat
sarvathā hetu doṣa tvam siddham iti iddham

original: ekābhāve cetyādyanuktvaikāsiddhau ceti vacanamasiddhiśca dvividhā svarūpatājñānataśceti sūcanārtham /

tat evam vyartha viśeṣaṇa asiddhayā ādeḥ hetu doṣa tva dyuktam para parigaṇita asiddhi bhedeṣu āśrayāsiddhayā ādi trayasya eva adoṣa tva kathanam iti

original: yaduktaṃ praśnadoṣāścatvāra iti tatra vaiphalyasyāsaṅgateśca doṣatvamayuktam /

original: tathāhi śabdo 'nityo 'smadādibāhyendriyagrāhyatvāditi prayukte paraḥ pṛcchati sāmānyaṃ nityamanityaṃ veti /

sāmānya nitya tvam ubhaya sammatam kṛtvā tatra anaikāntika tva udbhāvanasya prayojanasya pareṇa abhisandhātum api ucita tvāt

original: tatraiva prayoge paraḥ pṛcchati sāmānyamanugatadaṃ na veti /

original: anugatatvena nityatvaṃ prasādhya tatrānaikāntikatvaṃ vakṣyāmītyevamupodghātalakṣaṇāyāḥ saṅgaterapi pareṇābhipretamucitatvāt /

original: bhūtale ghaṭaḥ kinna syāditi viparītaśaṅkayā kuṇṭhitaśaktikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na tāvadghaṭābhāvaṃ

original: na hyatrāpi niragnikatvaṃ pramāṇatayopanyasyate 'pi tu asādhurayaṃ tvadīyo niragnikatvāṅgīkāro yataḥ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ nirdhūmatvamapyaṅgīkārayatītyabhiprāyaiti

original: punaḥ sanna bhavatītyuktau kuto na svavyāhatiriti hiśabdārthaḥ /

kṛṣṇaḥ ham iti vyavahāra darśanāt
jñāna mūla tā khalu vyavahārasya utsargataḥ siddhā
tad anupapattau tu upacāra tva kalpanā
na ca na aham kṛṣṇaḥ ityādi rūpā pratītiḥ asti
yad bhayāt upacāra tvam kalpayāmaḥ
atas bheda ādi pratīti abhāvāt asti eva ubhayī pratītiḥ
yathā āha
anyonyasmin anyonya ātmaka tām anyonya dharmān ca adhyasya iti

original: pratyakṣajā ceyaṃ pratītiriti kathaṃ pratyakṣasiddhasya nānumānādinā bādha ityata āha- kathaṃ ceti /

original: kathaṃ ca bhedo dehāderātmano na pramīyate // MAnuv_3,2.63ab //

original: yadā dehāderiti pañcamī tadā'tmana iti ṣaṣṭhī /

original: yadā cātmana iti pañcamī tadā dehāderiti ṣaṣṭhī /

original: jātamātrā mṛgā gāvo hastinaḥ pakṣiṇo khaṣāḥ /

kim atra sākṣiṇaḥ tīta anāgata artha gocara tvena iti atas āha āgamaḥ pi iti

original: āgamo 'pi hi sāmānye siddhe pratyakṣataḥ punaḥ /

original: nadyāstīre pañcaphalāni santītyādau tathā darśanāditi hiśabdārthaḥ /

kim prāk pada athar siddhayā iti atas āha katham iti
katham śakti grahaḥ nyathā

original: yadi padārthāḥ prāṅ na siddhāstarhi padānāṃ teṣu vācakatvaśaktigrahaṇaṃ na syāt /

original: atha śaktigraha eva kimartha ityata āha- atīteti //

atra atīta anāgata grahaṇam prakṛta apekṣam

original: mā bhūdanugataṃ sāmānyaṃ tataḥ kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- ata iti //

atas sarva padārthāḥ ca sāmānyāt sākṣi gocarāḥ
anugata sāmānya abhāvena atīta anāgata vartamāna vyaktīnām eva vācya tvāt agṛhīta śaktīnām ca

original: padānāmabodhakatvāt śaktigrahaṇasya ca padārthajñānena vināsambhavādviśeṣato jñāne
analyzed: padānām abodhaka tvāt śakti grahaṇasya ca padārtha jñānena vinā asambhavāt viśeṣataḥ jñāne

sarve iti
vartamāna atīta anāgatāḥ
astu atīta ādi jñāna apekṣā śaktigrahasya

original: tacca sākṣiṇeti kuta ityata āha- sarvamiti //
analyzed: tat ca sākṣiṇā iti kutas iti atas āha sarvam iti
sarvam iti eva vijñānam sarveṣām katham anyathā
pramāṇa antara abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
anumānena atīta ādi sarva sāmānya jñānam bhaviṣyati iti asya ca idam uttaram

original: atītānāgatavartamānaṃ sarvamapi liṅgamanena sādhyena vyāptamiti jñānāpekṣaṃ khalvanumānam /
analyzed: atīta anāgata vartamānam sarvam api liṅgam anena sādhyena vyāptam iti jñāna apekṣam khalu anumānam
na ca etat jñānam sākṣiṇā vinā sambhavati iti
yat vā pramāṇa antaram eva anena ucyate

original: atītādikaṃ sarvaṃ dhūmādi tathāvidhenāgnyādinā vyāptamiti jñānapūrvakaṃ khalvanumānam /
analyzed: atīta ādikam sarvam dhūma ādi tathāvidhena agni ādinā vyāptam iti jñāna pūrvakam khalu anumānam
tathā ca tīta ādi gocara tva abhāve nyasya tathāvidhasya abhāvāt anumāna mātra ucchedaḥ syāt iti
kiñca asti tāvat sarveṣām sarva śabda śakti grahaḥ
anyathā asarvam khalu idam brahma
iti vyavahāra vilopa prasaṅgāt

original: śaktigrahaścārthagrahāpekṣa iti sarveṣāṃ sāmānyataḥ sarvamiti jñānamaṅgīkāryam /
analyzed: śakti grahaḥ ca artha graha apekṣaḥ iti sarveṣām sāmānyatas sarvam iti jñānam aṅgīkāryam
sākṣiṇaḥ ca atīta ādi sarva gocara tva abhāve tat na syāt iti

original: nanvanugatasāmānyābhāve vyaktīnāmānantyādvayabhicārācca śabdaśaktigraha eva na saṅgacchate /
analyzed: nanu anugata sāmānya abhāve vyaktīnām ānantyāt vayabhicārāt ca śabda śakti grahaḥ eva na saṅgacchate

kiñcid sādṛśya vijñānāt akhilasya api vastunaḥ
śabda śakti grahaḥ ca syāt
tat etat vaiśeṣika parīkṣāyām vyākhyāta prāyam

original: nanvevaṃ sati gośabdasya gavaye 'pi śaktiṃ gṛhṇīyāt /

original: evaṃ sākṣipratyakṣasya vartamānamātragrāhitvamapākṛtya mānasapratyakṣasyāpi tadapākaroti- pratyakṣamiti //

original: pūrvānubhavānadhikaviṣayāyāḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇyameva durlabhaṃ kuto mānasapratyakṣajatvamityata āha- (yadeti)tadeti / *9,313*
analyzed: pūrva anubhava anadhika viṣayāyāḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇyam eva durlabham kutas mānasa pratyakṣa ja tvam iti atas āha yadā iti tadā iti

original: atītatvaviśeṣitārthaviṣayatve 'pi kathaṃ smṛteḥ pramāṇatvamityata āha- ādhikyamiti //

original: mānatve ca mānasapratyakṣajatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāditi cārthaḥ /

original: smṛtimātrā smṛtimātrārdhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā smṛtyanubhavarūpaikadeśasamudāyarūpā tathā smṛtyanubhavātmakaikajñānarūpā ca netyarthaḥ /

kutas na iti atas prathama pratijñāyām hetum āha tad idaṃtva iti

original: tathā jīvā apyanuṣyitajñānakarmasamuccayāḥ prārabdhakarmāvasāne dehādyupādhibhiratyantavimuktāḥ svābhāvikaṃ brahmatvamāpadyanta iti na kaściddoṣaḥ

tathā api upādhi bhinnaḥ tad aṃśaḥ jīvāḥ tad nimitta doṣavān ca bhaviṣyati kaḥ virodhaḥ
prakāra bhedasya virodha śānti hetu tvāt iti atas āha aśeṣa iti
aśeṣa śakti yuktaḥ ced svātantryāt doṣavān katham

original: yadyaśeṣaśaktiyuktaḥ paramātmāṅgīkṛtastadā tasyopādhau tannimitte ca svātantryātkathaṃ tannimittadoṣavānsyāt /
analyzed: yadi aśeṣa śakti yuktaḥ paramātmā aṅgīkṛtaḥ tadā tasya upādhau tad nimitte ca svātantryāt katham tad nimitta doṣavān syāt
ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: bhavatu vānena prakārabhedena virodhaśāntirmā vā bhūt /

prakāra bhedaḥ eva ayam anupapannaḥ

original: antaḥkaraṇādayupādhayo 'vidyānimittamittāni ca svaśaktyā paramātmānaṃ vicchidya tadaṃśasya jīvasya duḥkhādidoṣānkurvantīti tāvanna yujyate
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa ādi upādhayaḥ vidyā nimitta mittāni ca sva śaktyā paramātmānam vicchidya tad aṃśasya jīvasya duḥkha ādi doṣān kurvanti iti tāvat na yujyate

original: ataḥ paramātmaiva sarvaśaktiḥ svādhīnaireva taiḥ svātmānaṃ vicchidya svāṃśaṃ jīvaṃ duḥkhādidoṣayoginaṃ karotīti mantavyam /

original: śravaṇāttadanusāreṇa dvitīyāyāmapi vaiśabdasyaivārthatvopapatteretāḥ śrutayo vivakṣitārthe mānatāmāpadyanta iti bhāvaḥ / *9,424*
analyzed: śravaṇāt tad anusāreṇa dvitīyāyām api vaiśabdasya eva artha tva upapatteḥ etāḥ śrutayaḥ vivakṣita arthe māna tām āpadyante iti bhāvaḥ

original: ekatā ekadeśatārūpāṃśatā pitāputrayoraṃśāśibhāvo naikadeśatādirūpa iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ekatā eka deśatā rūpa aṃśatā pitāputrayoḥ aṃśa āśi bhāvaḥ na eka deśatā ādi rūpaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu anusandhāna abhāvena aṃśa tva vyāvṛttau aṃśa adhikaraṇa virodhaḥ syāt
na syāt

ādyasya asiddhi vyutpādane na kaḥ pi doṣaḥ

original: nahi hastādāvanusandhāne satīdaṃ dṛṣṭamityata āha- aṃśina iti //

aṃśinoḥ śeṣa sandhānam ati alpasya api vidyate

ati alpasya api aṃśinā uṃśa gata aśeṣa anusandhānam vidyate eva

aṃśa kīrti ādi atharmī īśvara preritena aṃśinā kriyate iti arthaḥ
alpasya api iti svarūpa saṅkīrtanam

original: bhuvi jātenāṃśena cāṃśigataṃ sukhaduḥkhādyevānubhūyate natu sarvam /
analyzed: bhuvi jātena aṃśena ca aṃśi gatam sukha duḥkha ādi eva anubhūyate na tu sarvam

original: bhūmyādyapakṛṣṭadeśaṃ garbhavāsādyavasthāṃ mānuṣānnopabhogādikaṃ ca nimittīkṛtyeśvareṇa kriyate /

original: dṛśyante khalvaghaṭitaṃ ghaṭayantyeśvaraśaktyā preritāḥ kāmakrodhādiparavaśā aihikāmuṣmikaduḥkhahetuṃ svaśiraśchedaṃ pātakaṃ ca kurvāṇā ityāśayaḥ

original: īśo 'nīśo jaganmithyā duḥkhī mukto bhidā nahi /

iti pratijñā vyāghātaḥ sarva doṣa adhika adhikaḥ

jagat mithyā bhidā na hi iti pramāṇa virodhasya
yadvā īśaḥ nīśaḥ duḥkhī muktaḥ iti sva vākya virodha udāharaṇe
jagat mithyā iti sva nyāya virodhasya

original: jagato mithyātve tannyāyena mithyātvasyāpi mithyātvāpattyā satyatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: jagataḥ mithyātve tad nyāyena mithyātvasya api mithyātva āpattyā satyatva prasaṅgāt
bhidā na hi iti sva kriyā virodhasya
anayā hi pratijñā kriyayā sādhya dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedaḥ tāvat prāpyate iti
sarva doṣeṣu adhika adhikaḥ tyanta adhikaḥ

atiheyam atas khilaiḥ

original: tasmādatyantabhinna eva brahmaṇā jīva iti sthitam /
analyzed: tasmāt atyanta bhinnaḥ eva brahmaṇā jīvaḥ iti sthitam
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām upamā adhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām arūpa adhikaraṇam
om arūpavat eva hi tad pradhāna tvāt om
atra adhikaraṇe prathama sūtreṇa brahmaṇaḥ rūpa rāhityam upapādya prakāśa vat ca avaiyarthyam iti dvitīya

original: sūtreṇa rūpavattvaviṣayāṇāṃ śrutīnāṃ vaiyarthyamāśaṅkaya vilakṣaṇarūpavattvāṅgīkāreṇa parihṛtam /
analyzed: sūtreṇa rūpavat tva viṣayāṇām śrutīnām vaiyarthyam āśaṅkaya vilakṣaṇa rūpavat tva aṅgīkāreṇa parihṛtam
vilakṣaṇa rūpavat tvam ca
āha ca tanmātram darśayati ca atha u pi smaryate
iti sūtra dvayena samarthitam iti bhāṣyeṇa pratīyate
tat anupapannam
antatas rūpavat tva aṅgīkāre rūpavat eva hi tat iti asya avaktavya tva āpātāt
prayojana abhāvāt ca asya vicārasya iti atas catuḥsūtryāḥ tātparyam āha sa ca iti
a rūpavat eva hi tad pradhāna tvāt
sa ca aprākṛta rūpa tvāt arūpaḥ
rūpam asya śiraḥ pāṇi pāda ādi ātmakam iṣyate
sa paramātmā
prakṛti śabdaḥ nyeṣām api tattvānām upalakṣakaḥ
a prākṛta rūpa tvāt
prākṛta rūpa rahita tvāt
guṇa ātmakam iti ukte sattva ādīnām pratītiḥ syāt
tad nirāsa artham sva śabdaḥ
ye paramātmanaḥ svarūpa bhūtāḥ guṇāḥ ānanda ādyāḥ tad ātmakam iti
rūpa śabdena ca śukla ādi guṇa pratītiḥ syāt
atas śiraḥ pāṇi iti vivaraṇam kṛtam
atas rūpavān ca iti śeṣaḥ
vicāra prayojanam darśayati atas iti
atas nā anitya tā nā eva śruti dvaya virodhi tā
anitya tā janma maraṇavat tā
nā api saundarya ādi abhāve iti ca draṣṭavyam
tathā ca tasmin bhaktiḥ upapannā iti śeṣaḥ

original: yadyapi paramātmano rūpaṃ kathaṃ tarhi tasya prasiddhavailakṣaṇyamātreṇārūpatvavyavahāra ityāśaṅkāparihārārthatvena prakāśavaditi sūtrāvayavo  #

original: yasmādevaṃ vairāgyādīnāṃ kramastasmāttadviṣayāṇāmeṣāṃ pādānāmapyayaṃ kramo bhavediti /

original: sarveṣāmapi sūtrāṇāṃ parasparaṃ saṅgatiṃ vivakṣuḥ prathamasūtrārthaṃ tāvadanuvadati

yuktitaḥ iti ārabhya viśiṣya
ācārya sampadā iti antena
yuktitaḥ jñāta veda arthaḥ nirasya samayān parān
paraspara virodham ca praṇudya aśeṣa vākya gam
adhyātma praṇavaḥ bhūtvā tasya sannihita tvataḥ
bahu yukti virodhānām bhānāt tad sahita śruteḥ
virodham ca nirākṛtya śrutīnām prāṇataḥ tu agān
parihṛtya virodhān ca tad prasāda anurañjitaḥ
deha kartṛ tvam īśasya jñātvā tad pitṛ tā smṛteḥ
viśeṣa sneham āpādya sarva kartṛ tvataḥ dhikam
niṣpādya bahu mānam ca tad anyatra ati duḥkhataḥ
utpādya adhika vairāgyam tad guṇa ādhikya vedanāt
sarvasya tad vaśa tvāt ca dārḍhyam bhakteḥ avāpya ca
yateta upāsanāya eva viśiṣṭa ācārya sampadā
tatra yateta upāsanāya eva iti anena brahma jijñāsā kartavyā iti etat vayākhyātam
anyat sarvam api atha śabda vyākhyānam
yadi api saṅgati mātra vivakṣayā idam ārabdham

original: tathāpi prāgathaśabdasyāvyākhyātatvāt tasya ca kevalasya vyākhyātumaśakyatvātsūtrārthānuvādaḥ kṛtaḥ /

original: atītena sārdhenādhyāyadvayena yāvānartho mīmāṃsitastāvataḥ sāmānyato jñānādimattvamathaśabdasyārtha iti saṅkṣepaḥ /

viśiṣya ācārya sampadā iti sarvatra anvayaḥ

original: tatra jñātavedārtha iti sarvavedānāṃ bhagavānevārtha iti jñānavānityanena prathamādhyāyaprameyamuktam /

veda artha virodhi yuktīḥ sāmānyatas nirākṛtya iti dvitīya adhyāyā

nirasya iti dvitīya pādasya
paraspara virodham ca iti tṛtīya caturthayoḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi pādabheda ityato 'dhyātmapravaṇo bhūtveti bahuyuktivirodhānāṃ bhānātkāraṇācchatīnāṃ yuktisahitaśrutervirodhaṃ ca nirākṛtyeti
analyzed: katham tarhi pāda bhedaḥ iti atas dhyā ātma pravaṇaḥ bhūtvā iti bahu yukti virodhānām bhānāt kāraṇāt śatīnām yukti sahita śruteḥ virodham ca nirākṛtya iti
caturthasya viśeṣaḥ darśitaḥ
adhyātma viṣaya śruti virodha parihāra jñānasya carama tva upapādanāya tasya iti uktam

bhāvāḥ mithyā samyak vā viditāḥ bandha mokṣayoḥ antaraṅga tām aśnuvate
na tathā bāhyāḥ
prāṇa tattva gān iti anena caturtha pāda gatānām eva mukhya prāṇa viṣayāṇām adhikaraṇānām prameyam adhyātma iti anena eva

anurañcitaḥ samīcīnaḥ kṛtaḥ iti yāvat

original: dehakartṛtvamityādinā trivṛtkurvata ityadhikaraṇasya sarvakartṛtvata iti sarvakartṛtvaṃ vijñāya tataśca bhagavadbhaktimānbhūtvetyarthaḥ /

atra api punarvacanasya tātparyam pūrvavat avadheyam
ati duḥkha sādhana tvam vijñāya

original: naca tacchravaṇamantareṇa sambhavatītyato yāvadarthajātamatra śāstre vicāryaṃ tāvataḥ śravaṇajanyaṃ jñānaṃ pūrvavṛttam /

original: sati ca tasmiñjanmāntarānuṣṭhitasatkarmaṇaḥ satkulaprasūtasya sāttvikaprakṛtervairāgyādikamavaśyaṃ bhavatyeva /

original: yattu parairnityānityavastuvivekaḥ śamadamādisādhanasampadihāmutraphalabhogavairāgyaṃ mumukṣutā ceti sādhanacatuṣyayaṃ pūrvavṛttamuktaṃ tadasmādukta  #

eva antarbhavati iti aviruddham
uttama bhaktānām mumukṣu tā na asti iti ācāryeṇa na saṅkīrtitā

sāttvika prakṛteḥ sat saṅga vaśāt īṣat vairāgya ādimataḥ śravaṇena tad abhivṛddhau kṛta manana ādeḥ bhūyas tad abhivṛddhiḥ iti
evam prathama sūtra artham abhidhāya tena dvitīya sūtrasya

original: ukte sati kimiti kartavyā prayojanābhāvānna kartavyeti saṃśayo bhavati /

original: saṃśaye sati tatparihārāya janmādyasya yata ityāheti śeṣaḥ /

original: yadvā kiṃ kartavyā na veti saṃśaye prayojanābhāvānna kartavyeti pūrvapakṣe ca satīti vyākhyeyam /

original: prathamasūtre 'taḥ śabdena jijñāsāyā mokṣārthatvātkathaṃ punarāśaṅketyata āha- ata iti //
analyzed: prathama sūtre taḥ śabdena jijñāsāyāḥ mokṣa artha tvāt katham punar āśaṅkā iti atas āha atas iti

original: ataḥśabdena jijñāsāyā mokṣārthatve udite 'pyasya mokṣārthatvasya viśeṣānuktito hetoḥ punaḥ saṃśaya iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: atas śabdena jijñāsāyāḥ mokṣa artha tve udite pi asya mokṣa artha tvasya viśeṣa anuktitaḥ hetoḥ punar saṃśayaḥ iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi janmādisūtreṇāpi naiṣā śaṅkā nivartate /

na tu viśeṣeṇa uktaḥ iti ced na
pramāṇa viśeṣa anuktitaḥ iti vyākhyānāt

original: ityāha tat paraṃ brahma vyāsākhyaṃ jñānaraśmimat // MAnuv_3,3.9 //

original: yataśca mokṣādidātāsāvato vo yuṣmākaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ jijñāsya evetyetamarthaṃ janmādisūtreṇāhetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yatas ca mokṣa ādi dātā asau atas vaḥ yuṣmākam mumukṣūṇām jijñāsyaḥ eva iti etam artham janma ādi sūtreṇa āha iti arthaḥ
ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: janmādyasya yata iti sūtre śrutamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: janma ādyasya yatas iti sūtre śrutam iti vākya śeṣaḥ

original: tathāca parameśvarasya mokṣadātṛtve śrutiḥ pramāṇamityuktaṃ bhavati /

tasya ca asiddhi parihārāya śruta tvam abhihitam iti

original: kṛtyānāṃ kartari veti va iti ṣaṣṭhī / *10,15*

original: tena ca śritādiṣu gāmigamyādīnāmupasaṅkhayānamiti dvitīyāyāḥ samāsaḥ / *10,25*

original: iti pravādadarśanācchiṣyāṇāṃ sūtrakāre bhaktimāndyaṃ mā bhūdityato viśeṣeṇopādanam / *10,26*

original: yenaiva bandhamokṣaḥ syāt sa ca jijñāsayā gataḥ /

original: tatra śākhābhedasya suprasiddhatvāccodanādikamapi viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ vyākhyātamityato yuktyantaramāha sūtrakāraḥ oṃ svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre  #
analyzed: tatra śākhā bhedasya su prasiddha tvāt codana ādikam api viśeṣa niṣṭham vyākhyātam iti atas yukti antaram āha sūtrakāraḥ om svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre
dhikārāt ca iti om
tatra hi iyantam vyācaṣṭe vedaḥ iti

original: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca / BBs_3,3.3 /
analyzed: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre dhikārāt ca sava vat ca  /
vedaḥ kṛtsnaḥ dhik antavyaḥ svādhyāya adhyayanam bhavet
ityādi vākya vaiyarthyam anyathā na nivāryate
kṛtsnaḥ dhik antavyaḥ sa rahasyaḥ dvijanmanā
iti smṛtim upādatte
svādhyāya adhyayanam kartavyam bhavet iti anena svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti śrutim
anyathā sva sva śākhā mātra jñāna aṅgīkāre
etat uktam bhavati

original: svādhyāyasya svādhyāyavidhestathātvena sāmānyataḥ sarvavedādhyayanavidhāyakatvena hetunā sarvajñānamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
analyzed: svādhyāyasya svādhyāya vidheḥ tathātvena sāmānyatas sarva veda adhyayana vidhāyaka tvena hetunā sarvajñānam aṅgīkaraṇīyam
adhyayanasya artha jñāna paryantana asthiteḥ
sva sva śākhā mātra jñāna aṅgīkāre ca asya vidheḥ vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
na ca vācyam śākhā bhedasya prasiddhayā svādhyāya pada kṛtsna pada darśanāt
śākhā bhedasya aśakti nimitta tva upapatteḥ iti

original: nanu śrutyantaraṃ hiśabdena smṛtiḥ sūtrakṛtopāttā tatkathamatra viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu śruti antaram hi śabdena smṛtiḥ sūtra kṛtā upāttā tat katham atra viparyayaḥ
ucyate
ākāṅkṣā krameṇa sūtram
vyākhyānam tu upodghāta prakriyayā iti na virodhaḥ

bhūyas darśanam ca anumāna aṅgam iti su prasiddham
āha na adhyayana vidhi prayuktam adhyayanam
kintu adhyāpana vidhi prayuktam eva
adhyayana vidheḥ niyojya rahita tvāt
na hi atra svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti vat kaścid niyojyaḥ śrūyate
nā api viśvajit ādau iva kalpayitum śakyate
adhyāpana vidhinā eva adhyayana siddhau kalpaka abhāvāt
na ca adhyāpana vidhiḥ api niyojya rahitaḥ iti vācyam
ācārya karaṇa kāmasya tatra niyojya tvāt
naṣṭa varṣam brāhmaṇam upanayīta iti ātmanepada śravaṇāt
sammānana utsañjana ācārya karaṇa jñāna bhṛti vigaṇana vyayeṣu niyamaḥ
iti ācāyar karaṇe nayateḥ ātmanepada vidhānāt
tam adhyāpayīta iti upanayana adhyāpanayoḥ eka kartṛkatā pratīteḥ

original: na hyadhyāpanamadhyayanena vinā bhavatīti svasiddhaye parā(pekṣa kṣepa)
analyzed: na hi adhyāpanam adhyayanena vinā bhavati iti sva siddhaye para apekṣa kṣepa
lakṣaṇena upādāna upādānena adhyāpana vidhiḥ eva adhyāpana vidhiḥ eva adhyayanam prayuṅkte
kiñca adhyayane sati vidhi jñānam tatas ca adhyayanam iti itaretarāśraya tvam syāt
atas na etad vākya udāharaṇam atra saṅgatam iti
ucyate
syāt evam yadi adhyāpana vidhi prayuktam adhyayanam syāt
na ca evam
adhyāpanasya jīvīkā artha tvāt

iti akaraṇe pratyavāya śravaṇāt

kiñca ekasya māṇavakasya adhyāpanena caritārtha tve māṇavaka antarasya anadhyayana prasaṅgaḥ

original: yo yenopanītaḥ sa tenādhyāpanīya iti cet / *10,100*
analyzed: yaḥ yena upanītaḥ sa tena adhyāpanīyaḥ iti ced
tarhi upanāyake parete dhyayana abhāvaḥ syāt
yat punar itaretara āśraya tvam uktam tat prātar sandhyām upāsīta ityādau api samānam
ayam api ācāryasya eva vidhiḥ
śauca ācārān ca śikṣayet ityādeḥ iti ced na
ācārye parete tad abhāva āpātāt
atas dhyayana ādi vidhim vṛddhāḥ kathañcid māṇavakam bodhayanti iti aṅgīkāryam iti alam

samācāre dhikārāt ca

original: adyāpi tena devādyāḥ śṛṇvate manvate sadā /

dhyāyanti ca yathāyogam

original: tenaiva hi kāraṇena devādyā adyāpi śravaṇamanane kurvanti sadā dhyāyanti ca /
analyzed: tena eva hi kāraṇena deva ādyāḥ adyā api śravaṇa manane kurvanti sadā dhyāyanti ca

original: anyathā mahāmatīnāṃ teṣāmekaikaśākhāśravaṇāderalpīyasaiva kālena kartuṃ śakyatvenādyāpi tatkaraṇaṃ na syāditi /
analyzed: anyathā mahāmatīnām teṣām ekaika śākhā śravaṇa ādeḥ alpīyasā eva kālena kartum śakya tvena adya api tat karaṇam na syāt iti
yathāyogam yathāśakti iti pratyekam viśeṣaṇam
śṛṇvantaḥ iti ātmanepade uktam

original: samācāraccetyevokte devādīnāṃ vedādhikāritvābhāvātkathametadityato devatādhikaraṇanyāyaṃ mā vismārṣīriti sūcayituṃ sūtrakṛtā samācāre 'dhikārāccetyuktam
analyzed: samācārat ca iti eva ukte deva ādīnām veda adhikāri tva abhāvāt katham etat iti atas devatā adhikaraṇa nyāyam mā vismārṣīḥ iti sūcayitum sūtrakṛtā samācāre dhikārāt ca iti uktam

original: yadi brahmasākṣātkāravanto 'pi devādyāḥ śravaṇādyanutiṣṭhanti tarhi tasya niravadhikatvaṃ prasaktamityata āha- tathāpīti //
analyzed: yadi deva ādyāḥ śravaṇa ādi anutiṣṭhanti tarhi tasya niravadhika tvam prasaktam iti atas āha tathā api iti

original: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ sarvathaiva hi // MAnuv_3,3.71d-f //
analyzed: śravaṇam mananam ca eva kartavyam sarvathā eva hi
yadi api sūtrakāreṇa deva ādi ācāraḥ pramāṇīkṛtaḥ tathā api
vastu para brahma ādikam
nirṇayaḥ yathā arthaḥ parokṣaḥ niścayaḥ
prathamasya eva śabdasya avastu nirṇayāt eva iti sambandhaḥ
vastu nirṇaya hetu tvāt śravaṇa ādeḥ iti hi śabda atharḥ
vastu nirṇaya paryantam śravaṇa manane kartavye iti asat

original: nirṇīte 'pyarthe punaḥ kāraṇāntaropanipātena saṃśayādyutpādasya darśanena vastunirṇayasyāvadhārayitumaśakyatvādityata āha- matīti //
analyzed: nirṇīte pi arthe punar kāraṇa antara upanipātena saṃśaya ādi utpādasya darśanena vastu nirṇayasya avadhārayitum aśakya tvāt iti atas āha mati iti
mati śruti dhyāna kāla viśeṣam guruḥ uttamaḥ

original: vetti tasyoktimārgeṇa kurvataḥ syāddhi darśanam // MAnuv_3,3.72 //
analyzed: vetti tasya ukti mārgeṇa kurvataḥ syāt hi darśanam
matiḥ mananam śrutiḥ śravaṇam
uttamaḥ śiṣya yogyatā abhijñaḥ
kurvataḥ śravaṇa ādikam
darśanam brahma sākṣātkāḥ
etat uktam bhavati
brahma darśana artham hi śravaṇa ādikam
na ca tat yathā kathañcid anuṣṭhitam tat sādhanam
kintu śiṣya yogyatā abhijña guru pradāna pūrvakam eva iti vakṣyati
atas tādṛśaḥ guruḥ eva śravaṇa ādi kāla viśeṣam upadekṣyati

original: yataḥ paraṃ kāraṇaśatopanipāte 'pi na saṃśayādyutpādaḥ syāditi / *10,109*
analyzed: yatas param kāraṇa śata upanipāte na saṃśaya ādi utpādaḥ syāt iti
deva ādyāḥ śravaṇa ādikam adya api kurvanti iti na yuktam
syāt hi darśanam iti śravaṇa ādeḥ tattva darśana sādhana tvasya ukta tvāt
deva ādīnām ca tattva darśanasya autpattika tvāt
yathā uktam na eva deva padam prāptāḥ brahma darśana varjitāḥ ityādi
na ca prāpta sādhyaḥ sādhanam utiṣṭhati iti atas āha śravaṇam iti
śravaṇam dṛṣṭa tattvasya mananam dhyānam eva ca
viśeṣa ānanda samprāptyā

original: dṛṣṭatattvasyāpi puṃsaḥ śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ dhyānaṃ ca viśeṣānandasamprāptyai yujyata eveti yojanā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa tattvasya api puṃsaḥ śravaṇam mananam dhyānam ca viśeṣa ānanda samprāptyai yujyate eva iti yojanā

original: evaṃ tarhi śravaṇāderdarśanasādhanatvoktirvyāhanyata ityata āha- anyasyeti //
analyzed: evam tarhi śravaṇa ādeḥ darśana sādhanatva uktiḥ vyāhanyate iti atas āha anyasya iti
anyasya etāni dṛṣṭaye
adṛṣṭa tattvasya etāni śravaṇa ādīni dṛṣṭaye bhavanti

original: yathā khalu samuccayavādināṃ jñānātpūrvāṇi karmāṇi jñānārthīni /
analyzed: yathā khalu samuccaya vādinām jñānāt pūrvāṇi karmāṇi jñāna arthīni

original: yathā ca sakāmāni karmāṇi saṃsārakāraṇāni niṣkāmāni tu jñānakāraṇāni /

original: dṛṣṭatattvasya tu viśeṣānandārthānīti devādīnāṃ tadanuṣṭhānaṃ ca yuktam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa tattvasya tu viśeṣa ānanda arthāni iti deva ādīnām tad anuṣṭhānam ca yuktam

original: samācārakathanaṃ ca yathāśakti vedārthaśravaṇamananayoḥ kartavyatāmātropodbalanāya kṛtamiti nāsaṅgatam /
analyzed: samācāra kathanam ca yathāśakti veda artha śravaṇa mananayoḥ kartavya tā mātra upodbalanāya kṛtam iti na asaṅgatam
viśeṣa ānandam tu vakṣyāmaḥ
śiṣya yogyatā abhijña guru upadeśa anusāreṇa śravaṇa ādikam kartavyam iti ayuktam
tādṛśasya guroḥ dulabha tvena śravaṇa ādi abhāva āpatteḥ
labhyamānaḥ pi asau anuṣṭhita śravaṇa ādinā ādhyātmika śakti sampannena eva śiṣyeṇa labhyate na anyena
tathā ca anyonya āśrayaḥ iti atas āha yadi iti

original: sarvajñānāṃ siddhāntānusāreṇa yo nirṇayaṃ jānāti tasmāt /

idam uktam bhavati

original: naca nirṇītaśāstrasyāpi vyākhyānavipratipattyābhiprāyo duradhigama iti vācyam /

original: evaṃ cāmukhye śravaṇādāvanuṣṭhite mukhyo 'pi gururlabhyata iti / *10,112*

original: sarvajñasya guroḥ śravaṇādyaṅgatve tadabhāve śravaṇādyabhāva eva kuto nāṅgīkriyate kimanenāmukhyena śravaṇādinā /
analyzed: sarvajñasya guroḥ śravaṇa ādi aṅga tve tad abhāve śravaṇa ādi abhāvaḥ eva kutas nā aṅgīkriyate kim anena amukhyena śravaṇa ādinā

kaḥ sau sat siddhāntaḥ yaḥ na hātavyaḥ
dvividhaḥ sat siddhāntaḥ para apara bhedāt
pratyekam dvividhaḥ vācanikaḥ ānuṣaṅgikaḥ ca

original: tatra vācanikaṃ paraṃ satsiddhāntaṃ tāvadāha- aśeṣeti //
analyzed: tatra vācanikam param sat siddhāntam tāvat āha aśeṣa iti
aśeṣa guṇa pūrṇa tvam sarva doṣa samujkhitiḥ
viṣṇoḥ anyat ca tat tantram iti samyak vinirṇayaḥ
anyat tat tantram iti sakala jagat janma ādi kāraṇatvam ucyate
nirṇīyate iti nirṇayaḥ
samyak vinirṇayaḥ vācanikaḥ para siddhāntaḥ
sākṣāt brahma svarūpa avadhāraṇa pare janma ādi sūtre khalu abhihitaḥ yam arthaḥ
ānuṣaṅgikam para siddhāntam āha svatantra tvam iti

original: svatantratvaṃ sadā tasya tasya bhedaśca sarvataḥ // MAnuv_3,3.79ab //
analyzed: svatantra tvam sadā tasya tasya bhedaḥ ca sarvatas
tasya viṣṇoḥ
dvitīyaḥ tasya iti śabdaḥ uttaratra sambaddhayate
sarvatas bhedaḥ ca iti
nanu etat api asambhavaḥ tu sataḥ na ātmā aśruteḥ pṛthak upadeśāt ityādinā abhihitam eva
tat katham ānuṣaṅkikaḥ siddhāntaḥ
satyam
tathā api pradhāna prameya upayogi tayā ukta tvāt adoṣaḥ
svagata bheda varjita tva ādeḥ upalakṣaṇam etat
iti samyak sthitiḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ
katham asya atharsya ānuṣaṅgika tvam iti atas āha adoṣa tvasya iti
adoṣa tvasya siddhayartham
viṣṇoḥ adoṣa tvasya siddhayartham aṅgīkāryaḥ yam arthaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
upalakṣaṇam etat
aśeṣa guṇa pūrṇa tvasya sakala jagat janma ādi kāraṇatvasya ca iti api draṣṭavyam
anena katham tad siddhiḥ iti atas āha yadi iti
yat abhede tad anvayaḥ

original: yasmājjagatābhede viṣṇordeṣasambandhaḥ prasajyate tasmāditi pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt jagatā abhede prasajyate tasmāt iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ
atra api abhedaḥ iti asvātantryasya api upalakṣaṇam
tad anvaye iti ca guṇa pūrti ādi abhāvasya api

original: anyattattantramityanyaśabdo 'muktaviṣaya iti pratītiḥ syāttadarthamāha- tattantratvaṃ ceti //
analyzed: anyat tat tantram iti anya śabdaḥ mukta viṣayaḥ iti pratītiḥ syāt tad artham āha tad tantra tvam ca iti
tad tantra tvam ca muktānām api
caśabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇena bhedena saha samuccaya arthaḥ
śeṣaḥ
kimartham idam aṅgīkāryam janma ādi sūtrasya amukta viṣaya tayā api upapatteḥ iti atas āha tat iti
tad guṇa pūrtaye

original: nahi muktānāṃ tattantratvena vinā tasya nirargalamaiśvaryaṃ siddhayati /
analyzed: nahi muktānām tad tantra tvena vinā tasya nirargalam aiśvaryam
na ca tad antareṇa guṇa pūrtiḥ bhavati iti
syāt etat
yadi muktāḥ paramātmanaḥ bhinnāḥ syuḥ
na ca tathā
tat kim tad tantra tvena iti atas āha muktānām api iti
muktānām api bhedaḥ ca
paramātmanaḥ utyanta bhedaḥ ca aṅgīkāryaḥ
anenatasya bhedaḥ ca sarvatas
iti etat api vivṛtam bhavati
kimartham iti atas prayojanam vaktum pīṭham āracayati nahi iti
nahi bhinnam abhinnatām
gacchat dṛṣṭam kvacid
muktānām paramātmanā abhedaḥ bhavan na tāvat prāc bhinnānām
bhinnasya abheda avāpteḥ kvāpi adarśanāt

original: na kevalamadarśanaṃ kiṃ tarhītyata āha- tasyeti //
analyzed: na kevalam adarśanam kim tarhi iti atas āha tasya iti
tasya api abhāvaḥ nubhava upagaḥ
bhinnam abhinna tām gacchati iti asya arthasya abhāvaḥ nubhava siddhaḥ pi

original: tataḥ saṃsāre 'pyabhinnānāmeva muktāvabhedo vyajyata ityeva vaktavyam /
analyzed: tatas saṃsāre pi abhinnānām eva muktau abhedaḥ vyajyate iti eva vaktavyam
tathā eva astu iti atas āha pūrvā iti
pūrva abhede doṣavat tvam īśasya iti ati bhinna tā
nārāyaṇena muktānām api samyak iti sthitiḥ
samarthitam tāvat duḥkha ādi rūpaḥ yam saṃsāraḥ satyaḥ iti

original: tataḥ saṃsāre 'pi jīvānāṃ paramātmanā bhede tasya doṣavattvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tatas saṃsāre pi jīvānām paramātmanā bhede tasya doṣavat tvam syāt
iti śabdaḥ hetau

original: samyak sthitiḥ satsiddhāntaḥ ānuṣaṅgikaḥ para iti śeṣaḥ / *10,124*
analyzed: samyak sthitiḥ sat siddhāntaḥ ānuṣaṅgikaḥ paraḥ iti śeṣaḥ
nanu ati bhinna tā kimarthā bheda abheda upapatteḥ iti atas āha bheda iti
bheda abhede pi abhedena doṣāṇām api sambhavaḥ

vipratiṣiddham ca an adhikaraṇa vācī
iti dvandva ekavat bhāvaḥ vā
atrā api pūrva nyāyena saṃsāre pi bheda abhedau aṅgīkāryau
tatas ca abhedena doṣāṇām api sambhavaḥ
bhedena tad parihāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced tarhi kim ajāgala stanāyitena abhedena iti
idānīm aparam siddhāntam āha nirdeṣatvam iti
nirdoṣa tvam ramāyāḥ ca
tathā parameśvara vat ramāyāḥ ca nirdeṣa tvam

original: yathoktam“kāmādiratatra tatra cāyatanādibhyaḥ'“samanā cāsṛtyupakramādamṛtatvaṃ cānupoṣya'; iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam kāma ādiḥ a tatra tatra ca āyatana ādibhyaḥ samanā ca asṛti upakramāt amṛta tvam ca an upoṣyaḥ iti
nirdeṣatvam iti uktyā pāratantryam api na asti iti pratīti nirāsa artham āha tat iti
tad anantara tā tathā
yat vā anena apara siddhānta antaram āha ekasmāt bhagavataḥ eva avara tvam iti
tat api uktam asya eva ca upapatteḥ ūṣmā iti
siddhānta antaram āha brahma iti
brahmā sarasvatī vīndra śeṣa rudrāḥ ca tad sriyaḥ

original: śakrakāmau tadanye ca kramānmuktāvapīti ca // MAnuv_3,3.83 //
analyzed: śakra kāmau tad anye ca kramāt muktau api iti ca
sat siddhāntaḥ iti
muktau saṃsāre pi
proktāt kramāt tiṣṭhanti iti arthaḥ
atra dvandva nirdiṣyānām sāmyam anyeṣām tāratamyam iti jñeyam
etat ca uktam iyat āmananāt iti
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
prapañca satya tva ādikam api grāhyam
kutas yam aśeṣa guṇa ityādi sat siddhāntaḥ iti atas āha nirṇītaḥ iti
nirṇītaḥ hariṇā svayam

original: hariṇā sūtrakāreṇa svayaṃ sākṣānnirṇīto na tu balātsūtrārthatayā kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: hariṇā sūtrakāreṇa svayam sākṣāt nirṇītaḥ na tu balāt sūtra artha tayā kalpitaḥ
etat ca tatra tatra darśitam eva
sat siddhāntam ahāpayan iti uktam

original: taddhānau ko doṣa ityata āha- etaditi //
analyzed: tad hānau kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha etat iti

original: etadvirodhi yat sarvaṃ tamase 'ndhāya kevalam // MAnuv_3,3.84cd //
analyzed: etat virodhi yat sarvam tamase ndhāya kevalam
jñātam sat iti arthaḥ
virodhi jñānam eva hi
asya tyāgaḥ
andhāya bhavati iti śeṣaḥ
kevalam iti na kadāpi na sukhāya iti arthaḥ
kutas etat iti atas āha andham iti

original: andhaṃ tamo viśantīti prāha śrutiratisphuṭam // MAnuv_3,3.85ab //

anena andhantamaḥ praviśanti ye vidyām upāsate iti śrutim upādatte
ukta arthasya prāmāṇika tvam vakṣyate
atas tad viruddha pratītiḥ avidyā bhavati eva
ati sphuṭam iti anena pareṣām vyākhyānam parācaṣṭe
tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ
nanu ca vastutas prāmāṇikaḥ sat siddhāntaḥ

original: prakṛtasya kathaṃ prāmāṇikatvamityata āha- ityevetyādinā sādaramityantena /
analyzed: prakṛtasya katham prāmāṇika tvam iti atas āha iti eva ityādinā sādaram iti antena
iti eva śrutayaḥ śeṣāḥ pañcarātram atha akhilam
mūlarāmāyaṇam ca eva bhāratam smṛtayaḥ khilāḥ
vaiṣṇavāni purāṇāni sāṅkhaya yogau parau api
brahmatarkaḥ ca mīmāṃsā iti anantaḥ śabdasāgaraḥ
anantara yuktayaḥ ca eva pratyakṣa āgama mūlakāḥ
pratyakṣam aiśvaram ca eva ramā ādīnām aśeṣatas
muktānām api amuktānām etam eva artham uttamam
iti eva iti ukta prakāra avadhāraṇam
etam eva artham iti prakṛta dharmi avadhāraṇam
tena vyatyāsam api vārayati
aśeṣāḥ iti śruti bhāgasya karma ādi paryavasāyi tva nirāsa artham
athaśabdaḥ samuccaye
akhilam iti jīvajanana ādi vākyānām api upādana artham
mūlarāmāyaṇam eva iti avāntararāmāyaṇānām vyudāsaḥ
akhilāḥ iti bahuvacana viṣaya vivaraṇa artham
itara purāṇānām pāśupata ādi mūla tvena aprāmāṇyāt vaiṣṇavāni iti uktam
parau iti arvācīna sāṅkhaya yoga vyāvṛttaye
tayoḥ a pramāṇa tvāt
mīmāṃsā trividhā
śabda sāgaraḥ prakāśayati iti sambandhaḥ
yuktayaḥ ca prakāśayanti pratyakṣa āgama mūlakāḥ eva
na tu ābhāsāḥ
pratyakṣam ca prakāśayati
eva śabdena īśvara pratyakṣasya prābalyam sūcayati
karmakāṇḍa ādīnām etad artha prakāśaka tvam katham iti atas uktam uttamam iti
karma ādeḥ uttāna artha tve pi uttamaḥ rthaḥ yam iti bhāvaḥ
veda ādīnām anyathā vyākhyānam vārayati anya avakāśa rahitam iti
anya avakāśa rahitam prakāśayati sādaram
kriyā viśeṣaṇam etat
sādaram iti tatra tātparya sadbhāvam ācaṣṭe
etad artha ṛṃthe
ca śruti ādikam anyatra paṭhitam eva draṣṭavyam
sat siddhāntam ahāpayan sat śāstrāṇi eva sarvadā śṛṇuyāt iti uktam

original: tatra sa(ta)tsiddhāntasvarūpaṃ nirūpya sacchāstrāṇyeva sarvadā śruṇuyādityetadvivṛṇoti- etadeva ceti //
analyzed: tatra sa tad siddhānta svarūpam nirūpya sat śāstrāṇi eva sarvadā śruṇuyāt iti etat vivṛṇoti etat eva ca iti

original: etadeva ca sacchāstraṃ duḥśāstraṃ tu tataḥ param // MAnuv_3,3.89cd //
analyzed: etat eva ca sat śāstram duḥśāstram tu tatas param

etat veda ādikam
tatas param tad viruddham tad udāsīnam ca
ṛc ādyāḥ bhāratam ca eva ityādi āgamaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva

original: duśśāstraṃ nābhyasediti vaktavye parityajediti vacanaṃ na kevalaṃ tatrodāsīnatvaṃ kintu hetutayā jñānamapi bhāvyamiti jñāpayitum /

anyathā tad vaiyarthyāt iti atas āha asaṃśayena iti
asaṃśayena tattvasya nirṇaye brahma darśanam

original: nirṇaye sati nididhyāsanena brahmadarśanaṃ bhavatīti yojyam /

anye punar manyante

original: ekapuruṣābhiprāye 'pi keṣāñcidaparokṣajñānaviṣayā ityasmākaṃ tadviṣayaḥ śabdo 'parokṣajñānaṃ janayet /

tathā api agnau śabdena aparokṣa jñāna utpattiḥ syāt

nahi tat tvam asi ityādi vākya pratipādyam brahma ātma aikyam aparokṣa tayā avabhāsate

samam etat vedānta vākyeṣu api

original: asmadādibhyaḥ ko viśeṣasteṣāmityata uktaṃ yoganiṣṭhāścāmalacakṣuṣa iti /

original: yadi bhāgaviśeṣasya saṃvādābhāvena kṛtsnasyāpi āgamasya no mānatvam apramāṇatvamityucyate tarhi akṣajasya pratyakṣamātrasya tathā apramāṇatvaṃ  #
analyzed: yadi bhāga viśeṣasya saṃvāda abhāvena kṛtsnasya api āgamasya no māna tvam apramāṇa tvam iti ucyate tarhi akṣa jasya pratyakṣa mātrasya tathā apramāṇa tvam
bhavet
asthāt sukha ādi viṣayasya pratyakṣasya saṃvāda abhāvāt

original: yadi ca saṃvādarahitasyaiva vedabhāgasya no mānatvamityucyate tadāsmatsukhādiviṣayasya pratyakṣasyāprāmāṇyaṃ bhavedeveti /
analyzed: yadi ca saṃvāda rahitasya eva veda bhāgasya no māna tvam iti ucyate tadā asmad sukha ādi viṣayasya pratyakṣasya aprāmāṇyam bhavet eva iti
yadi api yogi pratyakṣa saṃvādaḥ sti tathā

original: pratyakṣaṃ svata eva pramāṇaṃ tatra kiṃ saṃvādenetyata āha- yadyakṣajasyeti // *10,200*

original: yadyakṣajasya mātvaṃ syādāgamasya kathaṃ na tat // MAnuv_3,3.126cd //

original: yadi saṃvādena vinākṣajasya svata eva pramāṇatvaṃ syāttarhi āgamasya tat svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ na bhavet- aviśeṣādbhavedeva / *10,201*
analyzed: yadi saṃvādena vinā akṣajasya svatas eva pramāṇa tvam syāt tarhi āgamasya tat svatas eva prāmāṇyam katham na bhavet aviśeṣāt bhavet eva
dvitīyam nirākaroti yadi āgamasya iti
yadi vākya tva mātreṇa unmatta vākya vat āgamasya na māna tvam iti ucyate
tarhi akṣa ja tvena śukti rajata ādi viṣaya akṣaja vat stambha ādi akṣajasya api aprāmāṇyam syāt aviśeṣāt
nirdeṣa tvāt stambha ādi viṣayam akṣa jam pramāṇam iti atas āha yadi akṣa jasya iti

original: yadi nirdeṣatvātstambhādiviṣayasyākṣajasya pramāṇatvaṃ syāttarhyāgamasyāpi tata eva kathaṃ na bhavet /

bādhaka sadbhāvāt vā
na ādyaḥ

original: nārāyaṇānuvāke puruṣaśabdasya harau prayogādityāha- sarva iti //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa anuvāke puruṣa śabdasya harau prayogāt iti āha sarve iti
sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣādataḥ
evam puruṣa śabdaḥ ca prayuktaḥ bdhi śaye harau
na kevalam puruṣa jñānataḥ
kintu puruṣa śabdaḥ ca harau prayuktaḥ

original: vidyutaḥ puruṣādityukto 'pi paśupuruṣa eva kinna syādityata uktamabdhiśaya iti ambhasya pāre,
analyzed: vidyutaḥ puruṣāt iti uktaḥ upi paśu puruṣaḥ eva kin na syāt iti atas uktam abdhiśaye iti ambhasya pāre
yam antar samudre iti asmin puruṣe bdhi śaya tvasya śravaṇāt
mahodadhi śayontakaḥ ityādinā tasya viṣṇu liṅga tva avagamāt

original: itaścāyaṃ nārāyaṇo na paśupatirityāha- na tasyeti //
analyzed: itas ca ayam nārāyaṇaḥ na paśupatiḥ iti āha na tasya iti

original: na tasyeśe kaścana tasya nāma mahad yaśaḥ /

original: iti cādhipatistasya pratiṣiddhaḥ svayaṃ śrutau // MAnuv_3,3.156 //

original: viśvataḥ paramāṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim /

iti sarva adhika tva uktayā vinivāritaḥ

original: śrutau nārāyaṇānuvāke na tasyeti vākyena tasya puruṣasyādhipatiḥ svayaṃ mukhata eva pratiṣiddhaḥ /

paramaḥ ca asau aḥ ca iti paramāḥ tam paramām
liṅga vyatyayena paramam iti vā
viśvam pūrṇam

original: nārāyaṇānuvāka eva viśvata iti śrutau tasya puruṣasya sarvādhikatvoktyā saso 'pi vinivāritaḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa anuvākaḥ eva viśvatas iti śrutau tasya puruṣasya sarva adhika tva uktyā vinivāritaḥ
nahi sarva adhikasya samaḥ yujyate

asau nārāyaṇa anuvāka uktaḥ

original: upa samīpe cāro yasyāsau pradhānasyopasarjanabhūta upacārapumān paśupuruṣo netyarthaḥ /

original: nārāyaṇanāmādinā harirevāyamiti śiṣyaireva jñātuṃ śakyata iti noktam /

original: adhipatirāhityasarvādhikatvayostato 'vagatasya samādhikarāhityasya ca paśāvanupapatterna tadviṣayo 'yaṃ puruṣaśabdaḥ /

original: na tāvatā puruṣaśabdasya viṣṇau vācakatvaśaktiḥ siddhayati /

original: asau viṣṇurupacāreṇa puruṣaśabdaviṣayo na bhavati kintu mukhyavṛttyaiva /

original: puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam /

original: saṃsāre svādhīnaṃ jagadyadi muktau svādhīnatvaṃ jagadyadi muktau svādhīnatvaṃ jahyāttadā prekṣāvānna mocayet /

original: nanu ca puruṣa evedaṃ sarvamiti puruṣasyātra sar(vatvar)

original: kimete 'gnayaḥ kriyānupraveśinastaccheṣabhūtā uta svatantrāḥ kevalavidyātmakā iti /

kriyā mayasya agneḥ prakaraṇāt tad viṣayaḥ eva ayam upadeśaḥ iti prāpte bhidhīyate
vidyā ātmakāḥ eva ete gnayaḥ na kriyā śeṣa bhūtāḥ
te ha ete vidyā citaḥ eva iti nirdhāraṇāt
iti pareṣām vyākhyānam asat eva iti bhāvena uktam imam eva artham iti
viphala tvāt asyāḥ cintāyāḥ
pakṣa dvaye pi abhyudayaḥ eva hi asya prayojanam
yaḥ tu nitya anitya vastu viveka vāc śama dama ādi sampannaḥ sarva bhoga vairāgya upetaḥ mumukṣuḥ atha śabdena uttara mīmāṃsāyām adhikārī sūcitaḥ sa katham etāsu
phalgu cintāsu pravartate iti

original: evaṃ sūtrakṛtā pūrvapakṣitāni matāni nirākṛtyedānīṃ ye sūtrāṇāṃ vṛttikārā anyathā bhāṣante teṣāṃ matāni nirākurvāṇaḥ samuccayaniyamavādināṃ  #
analyzed: evam sūtrakṛtā pūrvapakṣitāni matāni nirākṛtya idānīm ye sūtrāṇām vṛtti kārāḥ anyathā bhāṣante teṣām matāni nirākurvāṇaḥ samuccaya niyama vādinām
matam tāvat apākaroti vinā iti

original: vinā karma na mokṣaḥ syājjñānenetyapi sā śrutiḥ /
analyzed: vinā karma na mokṣaḥ syāt jñānena iti api sā śrutiḥ

original: nānyaḥ panthā iti hyeva nivārayati sādaram // MAnuv_3,3.167 //
analyzed: na anyaḥ panthāḥ iti hi eva nivārayati sa ādaram
saṃsāra nivṛtti mātram kevalena jñānena bhavati
ānanda vṛddhiḥ tu kamarsa apekṣeṇa eva jñānena iti bhagavataḥ panthāḥ
yat vakṣyati sahakāri tvena ca iti

original: ato jñānakarmabhyāṃ mokṣa ityanuktvā karma vinā kevalajñānena na mokṣaḥ kintu karmasahitenetyuktam /
analyzed: atas jñāna karmabhyām mokṣaḥ iti an uktvā karma vinā kevala jñānena na mokṣaḥ kintu karma sahitena iti uktam

original: ityetadapi mataṃ saiva sūtragṛhītaiva nānyaḥ panthā iti śrutiḥ spaṣṭaṃ nivārayati /
analyzed: iti etat api matam sā eva sūtra gṛhītā eva na anyaḥ panthāḥ iti śrutiḥ spaṣṭam nivārayati

original: tamevaṃ viditveti jñānamātrasya mokṣasādhanatvamuktvā punarnānyaḥ panthā itrata vacanādādaro 'vagamyate /
analyzed: tam evam viditvā iti jñāna mātrasya mokṣa sādhana tvam uktvā punar na anyaḥ panthāḥ vacanāt ādaraḥ vagamyate
na ca samuccaya niyame kim api pramāṇam asti
andhantamaḥ praviśanti ityādīnām anya artha tvāt
yathā annam madhu saṃyuktam madhu ca annena saṃyutam

original: evaṃ tapaśca vidyā ca saṃyukte bheṣajaṃ mahad';
analyzed: evam tapaḥ ca vidyā ca saṃyukte bheṣajam mahat
ityādīnām parokṣa jñāna viṣaya tvāt
a parokṣa jñāna viṣaya tve pi ānanda vṛddhi artha tvāt
māyā vādinaḥ vadanti
dvividhaḥ mokṣaḥ para apara bhedāt
tatra aparaḥ vaikuṇṭha satya loka ādi prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ
paraḥ tu avidyā astamaye sati advaita brahma avasthāna rūpaḥ
pratīka ādi viṣayam anyathā upāsanam aparasya sādhanam

tatra anyathā upāsanasya vaikuṇṭha ādi prāpti sādhanatvam tāvat apākaroti anyathā iti
anyathā upāsanam api tam evam iti vādinī
nivārayati ādareṇa

original: evaṃ yathāsthitenaiva prakāreṇa na tvanyatheti vadantī śrutiranyathopāsanamapi puruṣārthasādhanaṃ nivārayati /
analyzed: evam yathā sthitena eva prakāreṇa na tu anyathā iti vadantī śrutiḥ anyathā upāsanam api puruṣa artha sādhanam nivārayati
na kevalam parama puruṣa jñāna vyatirikta pakṣān
tam iti anena yathā artha jñānam labdham eva
sa prakārasya prakṛtasya parāmarśa upapattau eka deśa viṣaya tva kalpanā anupapatteḥ
tathā api yat evam iti vadati tad ādara sūcana artham iti
parama mokṣa viṣayā iyam śrutiḥ astu
aparaḥ tu puruṣa arthaḥ nyathā upāsanena bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na iti
na pratīke iti prabhuḥ
na pratīke na hi saḥ
iti sūtra kāraḥ nyathā upāsanasya sarvathā api akartavya tvam vakṣyati
atas na tatpuruṣa artha leśa hetuḥ

original: sūtrasyārthāntaraṃ vakṣyāmīti vadantaṃ prati śrutivirodhamāha- andhamiti //

original: prārabdhakarmaṇāṃ bhogādeva kṣayastathāpi phalahrāso 'pi vidyata ityuktaniyamo bhavedupapanna iti śeṣaḥ /

api padena prathama adhikaraṇa prameyasya samuccayaḥ

original: tatsaṃsārikaphalasya na vipratipannamiti muktigatasya sādhayitumuttaro granthaḥ /

original: brahmādīnāṃ jñānaphale muktigāmityānande yadi yadi tāratamya no bhavettarhi kathaṃ“sa yo havai manuṣyāṇāṃ rāddha';

original: ityādikā taittirīyāṇāṃ ca śrutisteṣāṃ brahmādīnāmānandasya tāratamyaṃ brūyāt /

original: brahmādīnāmānandasya yaśca śrutirbravīti muktānāṃ tu tatsādhyata iti kiṃ kena saṅgatamityata uktamavṛjina iti /

original: tathāpi bahusaṃvidhānasādhyaṃ taditi na saṅkītirtam muktiṃ ca nigadya teṣāṃ muktānāmānandatāratamyaṃ ca bravīti /

brahmaṇaḥ api avasthā bhedena viśeṣaḥ ucyate na tu sarveṣu iti

caśabdena ukta guṇavat tvam samuccinoti

original: tarhi muktasya brahmaṇo ramāsāmyaṃ kimiti praśnaḥ- api tviti //

śvetadvīpa patim eva

original: umāparyantaṃ tu paścātpaścāduktāḥ pūrvapūrvairdṛṣṭebhyo dṛṣṭānāmanantāṃśāneva vāsudevasya viśeṣaśanvicakṣate /

original: vaiṣamyaṃ nirghṛṇatvaṃ ca tena syātāṃ parasya ca // MAnuv_3,4.84cd //

cemī
śvarasya sūtrakāreṇa vārita tvāt pramāṇa viruddham iti katham na aniṣyam
aṅgīkṛta sūtra prāmāṇyān prati ayam yatnaḥ iti nā asaṅgatiḥ

tān prati veda aprāmāṇya hetu tvena vaiṣamya ādeḥ deṣa tvam sūcayitum pulliṅga nirdeśaḥ
anyathā prakaraṇāt te vārite iti avakṣyat

original: napuṃsakaprayoge 'pi dūṣaṇe iti śakyate jñātumiti cenna /

tatas pi kim iti atas āha tāratamya iti
tāratamya anumā tena bhavet na ati prasaṅginī
tasmāt bādhā abhāvena samāna yogakṣema tva abhāvāt
mukta tāratamya sādhanam upasaṃharati śruti iti
śruti yukti balāt evam tāratamyam vibhāvyate

original: muktāvapi tataḥ ke 'tra virodhaṃ kartumīśate // MAnuv_3,4.102 //
analyzed: muktau api tatas ke tra virodham kartum īśate
vibhāvyate samyak anubhūyate

iti kāmacāra adhikaraṇam

original: // oṃ sarvathāpi tu ta evobhayaliṅgāt oṃ //

om na ca ādhikārikam api patana anumānāt tad ayogāt om
atra prathama adhikaraṇe na ādi jñāna yogyatāvatām eva jñāna prāptiḥ na anyeṣām iti uktam

original: seyaṃ jīvānāṃ nānāvidhānādiyogyatā prasiddhaistaistaiḥ kāraṇairutkarṣāparkaprāptirbhavatīti vadadbhirvādibhirnābhyupagamyate 'tastāṃ sādhayitumāha-  #
analyzed: sā iyam jīvānām nānāvidha anādi yogyatā prasiddhaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ kāraṇaiḥ utkarṣa āparka prāptiḥ bhavati iti vadadbhiḥ vādibhiḥ na abhyupagamyate tām sādhayitum āha
anādi iti

original: kathaṃ yuktyāgamasiddhetyata āgamānāṃ sāvakāśatvābhimānena yuktāveva bahumānavantaṃ pratyādau tāmāha- brahmaṇa iti //

nīti śāstra pravedi tvam śiva pūjā ratiḥ smṛtiḥ
varṇa āśrama ācāravat tvam svādhyāyaḥ bhaktiḥ acyute

original: śive sūrye tathā devyāṃ svabhāvo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.126 //
analyzed: śive sūrye tathā devyām svabhāvaḥ mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
anādi vaiṣṇavāḥ eva devatāḥ tu svabhāvataḥ
viparītāḥ tatas daityāḥ sadā eva anādi kālataḥ
mānuṣāḥ miśra matayaḥ vimiśra gatayaḥ pi ca
dvividhaḥ iti spaṣṭam deva asura tvayoḥ svabhāva tvam ākhyāyate
sarga śabdasya svabhāva vāci tvāt
dvividhaḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ
sargāṇām su bahutve piśubha aśubha phala adhikau
deva asura ākhyau dvau eva gandha vat yāḥ tad antarāḥ iti vacanāt avadhāraṇa upapattiḥ
svabhāvaḥ iti etat devānām daityānām iti atra api sambaddhayate

original: paramo dharma iti yajñādikānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: paramaḥ dharmaḥ iti yajña ādikānām kriyāṇām viśeṣaṇam

original: ratiḥ smṛtiśca viṣṇoḥ śivasya ceti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ratiḥ smṛtiḥ ca viṣṇoḥ śivasya ca iti śeṣaḥ
bahu śāli tvam iti asthāne bāhu bala prayogaḥ bhipreyate
yuddha satkriyā yuddha kauśalam
varṇa āśrama iti tad anuṣṭhāna mātra paryavasāyi tvam ācaṣṭe
acyuta ādau sāmyena bhaktiḥ iti arthaḥ
anādi iti spaṣṭam
anādi tvāt eva svabhāvataḥ na ādi kālataḥ iti etat mānuṣāḥ iti anena sambaddhayate
miśra matayaḥ samyak asamyak jñānāḥ
vimiśra gatayaḥ sukha duḥkha ātmaka saṃsāra phalāḥ
deva ādīnām api evam phalam jñātavyam
śruti smṛti udāharaṇa phalam darśayati ityādi iti
ityādi vākya sandarbhe jñāyate na ādi yogyatā

uktānām anumānānām vyāpti avadhāraṇa ādi artham āgamānām ca anya artha vyākhyāna nirāsa artham anugrāhakam tarkam āha yadi iti

original: yadyanādirviśeṣo na sāmprataṃ kathameva saḥ // MAnuv_3,4.129ab //

sa viśeṣaḥ paridṛśyamānaḥ atiśayaḥ
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadi hiraṇyagarbhasyānādiḥ sarvotkṛṣṭo yogyatālakṣaṇo viśeṣo na syāttadā sāmprataṃ dṛśyamānaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatvaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: yadi hiraṇyagarbhasya anādiḥ sarva utkṛṣṭaḥ yogyatā lakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ na syāt tadā sāmpratam dṛśyamānam sarva utkṛṣṭa tvam na syāt

original: nanu brahmādīnāṃ yogyatālakṣaṇānādiviśeṣābhāve 'pi sādino viśiṣyādṛṣṭādeva sarvotkṛṣṭatvādikaṃ bhaviṣyati /

original: tasmānna kevalaṃ phalaṃ kinnāmottarottaramadṛṣṭaṃ ca pūrvapūrvādṛṣṭādbhavatīti cārvākavyatiriktasarvavādibhiḥ svīkṛtam /

atas sarva utkarṣa hetoḥ viśiṣya adṛṣṭasya tathāvidha prāktana adṛṣṭa anapekṣa utpattika tva abhyupagame syāt

original: bhavatvanyeṣāṃ vādināmitthaṃ siddhānto mama tu sarvotkarṣādiphalotpattāveva viśiṣyādṛṣṭāpekṣā natu tadutpattāvapīti /

original: yadvā yadviriñcasya sarvotkarṣanimittaṃ viśiṣyamadṛṣṭaṃ tasya tathāvidhādṛṣṭakāryatve 'pi tasya nādṛṣṭakāryatvamiti / *11,178*

original: kvacidviriñcotkarṣahetau taddhetau vādṛṣṭe viśeṣo 'tiśayo yadyākasmiko 'dṛṣṭanirapekṣa eveṣyate,

original: na jātu mama sukhamasti na veti saṃśayo nāpi pratīyamānamidaṃ sukhaṃ sadasadveti saṃśaya iti hiśabdenāha /

sākṣi darśanam abādhitam eva iti na yujyate śukti rajata ādau bādha darśanāt

original: nahi pratītisamayamātravartini tatrānyajñānaṃ sambhavatītyata āha- yadīti // *11,210*
analyzed: nahi pratīti samaya mātra vartini tatra anya jñānam sambhavati iti atas āha yadi iti

original: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syād darśanaṃ mānasaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.143ef //
analyzed: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syāt darśanam mānasam hi tat

original: yaddarśanaṃ kvacicchuktirajatādau viṣaye vyabhicāri bādhitaṃ syāttaccakṣurādikaraṇakaṃ manaḥpariṇatirūpameva na sākṣirūpam /
analyzed: yat darśanam kvacid śukti rajata ādau viṣaye vyabhicāri bādhitam syāt tat cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇakam manaḥ pariṇati rūpam eva na sākṣi rūpam
kutas etat
sākṣiṇaḥ tu tathātve sarva vyavahāra vilopa prasaṅgasya ukta tvāt
tat idam uktam hi śabdena
sambhavati ca asya mānasa tvam anyathā khyāti samarthanāt iti
mānasasya darśanasya doṣa bādha sambhavaḥ bhihitaḥ

original: kīdṛśasya tarhi prāmāṇyamityata āha- mana iti //
analyzed: kīdṛśasya tarhi prāmāṇyam iti atas āha manaḥ iti
manaḥ cakṣuḥ darśana ādeḥ api yatra eva sākṣiṇā

original: prāmāṇyaṃ sugṛhītaṃ syāt tat parīkṣitadarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.144 //
analyzed: prāmāṇyam su gṛhītam syāt tat parīkṣita darśanam
manaḥ cakṣuḥ śabdau śrotra ādeḥ upalakṣakau
darśanam sākṣātkāraḥ
ādi padena laiṅgika śabda jñāna saṅgrahaḥ
indriya liṅga śabda karaṇakasya manaḥ vṛtteḥ jñānasya iti atharḥ
nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī
sambhāvita doṣa bādhasya api iti apeḥ arthaḥ

original: yatra jñāne sugṛhītaṃ parīkṣayā niścitaṃ tatparīkṣitadarśanaṃ pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: yatra jñāne su gṛhītam parīkṣayā niścitam tat parīkṣita darśanam pramāṇam iti śeṣaḥ
pratyakṣa āgama jñāna prāmāṇya grahaṇe eva parīkṣā upayogaḥ

original: dharmijñānānumānopamānānuvyavasāyānāṃ tu prāmāṇyagrahaṇaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣamiti kecinmanyante /
analyzed: dharmi jñāna anumāna upamāna anuvyavasāyānām tu prāmāṇya grahaṇam na parīkṣā apekṣam iti kecid manyante
tad nirāsāya sarva mānasa saṅgraha artham manaḥ cakṣuḥ darśana ādeḥ madhye iti uktam
anyathā yatra jñāne ityādikam eva avakṣyat
pramāṇam iti etāvatā pūrṇe parīkṣita darśanam iti anuvādena su gṛhītam iti etat vivṛṇoti

original: evaṃ mānasapratyakṣādijñānaprāmāṇyagrahasya parīkṣādhīnatve 'pi sākṣiprāmāṇyagrahasya tadanapekṣatvānna parīkṣānavasthetyuktam /
analyzed: evam mānasa pratyakṣa ādi jñāna prāmāṇya grahasya parīkṣā adhīna tve pi sākṣi prāmāṇya grahasya tad anapekṣa tvāt na parīkṣā anavasthā iti uktam
tatra kim anayā dvividha kalpanayā

original: sākṣivatpratyakṣādijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyagrahaḥ parīkṣānapekṣa evoktavidhayā svataḥ kinna syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharati- neti //
analyzed: sākṣi vat pratyakṣa ādi jñānasya api prāmāṇya grahaḥ parīkṣā anapekṣaḥ eva ukta vidhayā svatas kim na syāt iti āśaṅkām pariharati na iti

original: na jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate // MAnuv_3,4.145ab //
analyzed: na jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa prāmāṇyam tasya dṛśyate
jñānasya dṛṣṭiḥ jñāna dṛṣṭiḥ
tasya jñānasya
etat uktam bhavati
vṛtti jñānānām sva prakāśa tvam eva tāvat asat
pramāṇa abhāvāt
jñāna vyavahārasya sākṣi vedya tvena eva upapatteḥ
idam aham jānāmi iti anubhavasya sākṣi rūpa tvāt
vimatam jñānam na sva prakāśam anātma tvāt kārya tvāt anitya tvāt manaḥ rūpa tvāt sukha ādi vat ityādi pramāṇa virodhāt ca

original: bhavatu vā jñānaṃ svaprakāśaṃ tathāpi svarūpamātra eva na tu svadharme prāmāṇye 'pi /
analyzed: bhavatu vā jñānam sva prakāśam tathā api svarūpa mātre eva na tu svadharme prāmāṇye
tathā hi

original: vedavākyaśravaṇe sati bāhyasya vākyārthajñānamutpadyate na vā /
analyzed: veda vākya śravaṇe sati bāhyasya vākya artha jñānam utpadyate na vā
na dvitīyaḥ
satyām sāmagṣām kārya anudaya anupapatteḥ

ādye tat prakāśate na vā
na iti pakṣe
prathame tad prāmāṇyam prakāśate na vā
na ādyaḥ
tad nirāsasya anu
sā anupapatteḥ

original: tato jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa na jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ dṛśyata iti dvitīya evāṅgīkāryaḥ /
analyzed: tatas jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa na jñāna prāmāṇyam dṛśyate iti dvitīyaḥ eva aṅgīkāryaḥ

original: tathāca svaprakāśajñānenaiva prāmāṇyagraha iti kathaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca sva prakāśa jñānena eva prāmāṇya grahaḥ iti katham syāt

original: apauruṣeyatvādiyuktibhiḥ prabodhito bāhyaḥ pratipadyate ca tatprāmāṇyamiti kathaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣatvam /
analyzed: apauruṣeya tva ādi yuktibhiḥ prabodhitaḥ bāhyaḥ pratipadyate ca tat prāmāṇyam iti katham na parīkṣā apekṣa tvam

original: anyathā vaidikajñānaprāmāṇye vipratipattireva na syāt jñānasvarūpavat /
analyzed: anyathā vaidika jñāna prāmāṇye vipratipattiḥ eva na syāt jñāna svarūpa vat
kiñca evaṃvādinaḥ mate śukti rajata ādi vibhramaḥ na syāt

original: idamanubhavasya rajatasmaraṇasya ca bhedāgraho hi vibhramaḥ /
analyzed: idam anubhavasya rajata smaraṇasya ca bheda agrahaḥ hi vibhramaḥ
tatra prāmāṇya vat bhedasya anubhava tva smaraṇa tvayoḥ ca prakāśaḥ vaśyambhāvi iti katham vibhrama avakāśaḥ
nahi prāmāṇyasya bheda ādeḥ ca kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti iti
jñāna prāmāṇye saha eva anumeye iti api asat
jñānasya apya
nu meya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt

nupapatteḥ ca
a parokṣa avabhāsa virodhāt ca

original: anumeyatve 'pi jñānasya na jñānānumitimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate /
analyzed: anumeya tve pi jñānasya na jñāna anumiti mātreṇa prāmāṇyam tasya dṛśyate
tat hi jñāta tayā vyavahāreṇa kāryeṇa vā anumātavyam
na ca tāvatā prāmāṇyam anumātum śakyate
