original: tato jñātatādimātreṇa pratīte jñāne bādhābhāvādinā prāmāṇyamanumeyam /
analyzed: tatas jñāta tā ādi mātreṇa pratīte jñāne bādhā bhāva ādinā prāmāṇyam anumeyam
anyathā bāhyānām api vaidika jñāna prāmāṇya anumāna prasakteḥ
prasaktam api apodyate iti ced
tarhi apavāda nirāsāya parīkṣā apekṣā vaśyambhāvinī iti āgatam
idam eva ca asmābhiḥ abhidhāsyate
sarvathā parīkṣā anapekṣā iti tu na kṣamyate
etena sākṣi vedya tā pakṣaḥ pi pratikṣiptaḥ
aupaniṣada jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa bāhyaiḥ tad prāmāṇyasya adarśanāt
caturtha pakṣaḥ tu ati mandaḥ
anumāna ādi jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa tad prāmāṇyasya cārvāka ādibhiḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt
vibhāge māna abhāvāt ca
dharmi jñāna ādi prāmāṇye vigāna abhāvāt iti ced na
nirālambana ādi mata darśanāt
upapatti bādhitam tat iti ced
tarhi svīkṛtā api uṣmatā eva parīkṣā apekṣā iti alam pallavena iti
evam tarhi prāmāṇyam parīkṣā apekṣa grahaṇam eva aṅgīkriyatām
dvidhā kalpanasya anyāyya tvāt iti atas āha niyamena iti
niyamena sukha ādyeṣu prāmāṇyam sākṣi gocaram
dṛśyate iti vartate
sākṣī gocaraḥ yasya tat tathā uktam
gocara tvam ca āśrayatayā vivakṣitam
sukha ādi viṣaye yat sākṣi gatam prāmāṇyam tat niyamena dṛśyate
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadi vṛttijñānānāmiva sākṣijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ taddarśanamātreṇa na dṛśyate tadādhikamapi kāraṇaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
analyzed: yadi vṛtti jñānānām iva sākṣi jñānasya api prāmāṇyam tad darśana mātreṇa na dṛśyate tadā adhikam api kāraṇam kalpayāmaḥ
na ca evam
sukha jñāne dṛṣṭe tad prāmāṇya ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayāṇām kadāpi adarśanāt
kalpaka sadbhāve dvidhā kalpanasya adūṣaṇa tvāt iti
kiñca sākṣi prāmāṇyasya api parīkṣā apekṣa grahaṇa tve navasthā ca syāt
nanu prāmāṇya grahaṇam abhilaṣatā na anavasthātaḥ bhettum yuktam
parīkṣā anavasthā bhāve pi grāhaka anavasthāyāḥ duṣparihara tvāt iti atas āha sva prāmāṇyam iti

original: svaprāmāṇyaṃ sadā sākṣī paśyatyeva suniścayāt // MAnuv_3,4.146ab //
analyzed: sva prāmāṇyam sadā sākṣī paśyati eva su niścayāt
sākṣī eva iti sambandhaḥ
sadā su niścayāt iti
parīkṣā an apekṣam eva iti yāvat
etat ca anubhava anyathā anupapattibhyām kalpyate
nanu evam sati vṛtti jñānānām paratas prāmāṇyam uktam syāt
jñāna sva rūpasya sākṣi vedya tvāt
prāmāṇyasya parīkṣā gamya tvāt

original: tathāca na vilakṣaṇatvāditi yatsvataḥ prāmāṇyamiṣyaṃ tattyaktaṃ syādityata āha- jñānasyeti //
analyzed: tathā ca na vilakṣaṇa tvāt iti yat svatas prāmāṇyam iṣyam tat tyaktam syāt iti atas āha jñānasya iti
jñānasya grāhakeṇa eva sākṣiṇā māna tā miteḥ

original: jñānasya grāhakeṇa sākṣiṇaiva jñānasya mānatāyā miteḥ kāraṇātsvataḥprāmāṇyamiṣyata eveti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: jñānasya grāhakeṇa sākṣiṇā eva jñānasya māna tāyāḥ miteḥ kāraṇāt svatas prāmāṇyam iṣyate eva iti sambandhaḥ

original: bhavetsvataḥprāmāṇyatyāgo yadi jñānameva sākṣivedyaṃ na prāmāṇyamiti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: bhavet svatas prāmāṇya tyāgaḥ yadi jñānam eva sākṣi vedyam na prāmāṇyam iti brūmaḥ
na ca evam
jñāna vat tat prāmāṇyasya api sākṣi vedya tva abhyupagamāt iti

original: kimarthaṃ tarhi parīkṣāvaśyambhāvo 'bhyupagamyata ityata āha- doṣeti //
analyzed: kimartham tarhi parīkṣā vaśyambhāvaḥ bhyupagamyate iti atas āha doṣa iti
doṣa abhāve pramāṇa tvam
sākṣiṇā niścita tvam iti vakṣyamāṇam iha api yojyam
iti prāmāṇyasya iti pada dvayam adhyāhāryam

original: jñānaṃ gṛhṇansākṣī karaṇadoṣābhāve 'sya prāmāṇyamityeva prāmāṇyaṃ niścinoti /
analyzed: jñānam gṛhṇan sākṣī karaṇa doṣa abhāve sya prāmāṇyam iti eva prāmāṇyam niścinoti
na tu pramāṇam eva idam iti
tatas kim iti atas āha doṣa abhāvasya iti
doṣa abhāvasya sākṣiṇā
niścita tvam kvacid ca eva svatas prāmāṇyam iṣyate
parīkṣayā iti śeṣaḥ
caḥ va dhāraṇe
kvacid eva prayojana vaśāt jijñāsāyām jātāyām parīkṣā lābhe ca iti arthaḥ
doṣa abhāva niścaya arthā parīkṣā na tu prāmāṇya grahaṇa arthā
tat punar jñānam iva sākṣi vedyam eva
atas na svatas prāmāṇya parityāgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: syādetadyadīyaṃ prakriyā pramāṇavatī syānna ca tadastītyata āha- ata iti //
analyzed: syāt etat yadi iyam prakriyā pramāṇavatī syāt na ca tat asti iti atas āha atas iti

original: ato na sarvamānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: atas na sarva mānānām prāmāṇyam niścitam bhavet

original: sākṣiṇā niścitaṃ yatra tat prāmāṇyasvalakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.148 // *11,223*
analyzed: sākṣiṇā niścitam yatra tat prāmāṇya sva lakṣaṇam

original: ata eva hi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prathamato na niścitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: atas eva hi sarveṣām jñānānām prāmāṇyam prathamatas na niścitam bhavet

original: kinnāma yatra yadā parīkṣāsahakṛtena sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavati tattadaiva prāmāṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyasvarūpamaprāmāṇyaviviktaṃ  #
analyzed: kinnāma yatra yadā parīkṣā sahakṛtena sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyam niścitam bhavati tat tadā eva prāmāṇyam sva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇya svarūpam aprāmāṇya viviktam
prāmāṇyam siddhayati
idam uktam bhavati

original: yadi sākṣī doṣābhāve pramāṇametaditi prathamaṃ sammugdhaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhītvā paścājjijñāsāyāṃ
analyzed: yadi sākṣī doṣa abhāve pramāṇam etat iti prathamam sammugdham prāmāṇyam gṛhītvā paścāt jijñāsāyām

original: satyāṃ parīkṣayā pramāṇamevetyavadhārayatītyeṣā prakriyā nāṅgīkriyeta tadānabhyastaviṣayāṇāṃ
analyzed: satyām parīkṣayā pramāṇam eva iti avadhārayati iti eṣā prakriyā na aṅgīkriyeta tadā anabhyasta viṣayāṇām

original: śabdādinā jātānāṃ sarveṣāmapi jñānānāṃ prathamameva prāmāṇyamavadhāryeta /
analyzed: śabda ādinā jātānām sarveṣām api jñānānām prathamam eva prāmāṇyam avadhāryeta
na ca etat asti
tena jānīmaḥ u sti iyam prakriyā iti
uktam artham buddhayā ārohāya saṅkṣipya āha nahi iti

original: na hi kaścit sukhādyeṣu saṃśayaṃ kurute janaḥ /
analyzed: na hi kaścid sukha ādyeṣu saṃśayam kurute janaḥ
na ca eva akhila mānāni niścinoti akhilaḥ janaḥ
tasmāt anubhava ārūḍham kimartham upalapyate

original: yasmātsukhādyeṣu kaścitsaṃśayaṃ na karoti yasmāccākhilāni vṛttijñānāni darśana eva pramāṇatayākhilo jano na niścinoti tasmātsākṣiprāmāṇyaṃ  #
analyzed: yasmāt sukha ādyeṣu kaścid saṃśayam na karoti yasmāt ca akhilāni vṛtti jñānāni darśane eva pramāṇa tayā akhilaḥ janaḥ na niścinoti tasmāt sākṣi prāmāṇyam
parīkṣā anapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇā eva gṛhyate
vṛtti jñānānām tu tad sāpekṣeṇa iti anubhava ārūḍham prameyam kimartham apalapyate
nirnimittam apalapitum na śakyate iti
na parīkṣā anavasthā syāt
iti uktam upasaṃharati doṣa abhāva ādikam ca iti

original: doṣābhāvādikaṃ caiva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati // MAnuv_3,4.150cd //
analyzed: doṣa abhāva ādikam ca eva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati
sākṣī eva iti sambandhaḥ

original: svasya parīkṣāyāśca doṣābhāvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca parīkṣānirapekṣaḥ sākṣyeva samyak prapaśyati /
analyzed: svasya parīkṣāyāḥ ca doṣa abhāvam prāmāṇyam ca parīkṣā nirapekṣaḥ sākṣī eva samyak prapaśyati
tasmāt na kā api anavasthā iti
aparīkṣitam eva
ityādinā uktam upasaṃharati tat iti

original: tat parīkṣitamānena na doṣo viṣṇavi kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.151ab //
analyzed: tat parīkṣita mānena na doṣaḥ viṣṇavi kvacid
tat tasmāt parīkṣitam eva mānam

original: tena ca bhagavati kvacidapi doṣo nāstīti siddham /
analyzed: tena ca bhagavati kvacid api doṣaḥ na asti iti siddham
tad virodhāt aparīkṣitam doṣa darśanam apramāṇam eva iti arthaḥ

original: evamaparīkṣitaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ parīkṣitena nirdeṣatādarśanena bādhitaṃ na bhagavato doṣitvaṃ sādhayituṃ śaktamityuktam /
analyzed: evam aparīkṣitam doṣa darśanam parīkṣitena nirdeṣa tā darśanena bādhitam na bhagavataḥ doṣi tvam sādhayitum śaktam iti uktam
idānīm tādṛśasya api sādhaka tve tiprasaṅgam sūcayati aparīkṣita iti
aparīkṣita dṛṣṭiḥ tu kasmin arthe na vidyate
śukti ādīnām rajata tva ādau api vidyate eva
tatas ca tathā tat api siddhayet aviśeṣāt iti bhāvaḥ
tat evam doṣa darśanam parīkṣita pratyakṣa virodhāt apramāṇam iti abhihitam
niraniṣyaḥ niravadyaḥ ityādi āgama virodhāt ca
syāt etat
prāk tattvamasi ādi āgamasya pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt pratīta arthe na prāmāṇyam iti uktam
tat katham tad viparītam pratyakṣasya āgama virodhena aprāmāṇyam idānīm ucyate iti āśaṅkām parihartum āha tat iti
tat pratyakṣa viruddha arthe na āgamasya api māna tā
upajīvyam akṣa jam yatra tat anyatra viparyayaḥ

original: yatra yadākṣajamāgamasyopajīvyaṃ tat tadā pratyakṣaviruddhārthe jātyā prabalasyāpyāgamasya mānatā nāsti /
analyzed: yatra yadā akṣa jam āgamasya upajīvyam tat tadā pratyakṣa viruddha arthe jātyā prabalasya api āgamasya māna tā nā asti
tasmāt uktā adu
upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvāt anyatra viparīta upajīvya upajīvaka bhāve bādhya bādhaka bhāvasya api viparyayaḥ
yad āgamaḥ pratyakṣasya upajīvyaḥ tad āgama viruddha arthe pratyakṣasya na māna tā iti arthaḥ
tatas kim iti atas āha laukikaḥ iti
laukike vyavahāre tra pratyakṣasya upajīvya tā
avatāra ādi daṣṭau syāt āgamasya upajīvya tā

original: laukike pratyakṣasiddhajīvādiviṣaye brahmātmakatvādibodhanarūpe vyavahāre tattvamasyādyāgamena kriyamāṇe atra āgame āgamaṃ prati pratyakṣasyopajīvyatā
analyzed: laukike pratyakṣa siddha jīva ādi viṣaye brahma ātmaka tva ādi bodhana rūpe vyavahāre tattvam asi ādi āgamena kriyamāṇe atra āgame āgamam prati pratyakṣasya upajīvya tā

original: avatārāṇāṃ viśvādīnāṃ ca doṣadṛṣṭau pratyakṣādikaṃ pratyāgamasyopajīvyatā syāt /
analyzed: avatārāṇām viśva ādīnām ca doṣa dṛṣṭau pratyakṣa ādikam pratyāgamasya upajīvya tā syāt
etat uktam bhavati
prāk pratyakṣa virodhena āgamasya aprāmāṇyam abhidhāya idānīm āgama virodhena pratyakṣasya aprāmāṇya abhidhānam na viruddham
nahi nirviśeṣaṇayoḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ parasparam bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ bhihitaḥ
kintu upajīvaka tvena bādhya tvam upajīvya tvena bādhaka tvam
tat ca tatra anyathā atra anyathā iti katham virodhaḥ iti

original: anena doṣaviṣayapratyakṣavirodhādāgamasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kinna syāditi codyaṃ garbhasrāveṇaiva gatam /

āgamasya ujīvya tayā pratyakṣataḥ prābalyasya ukta tvāt
katham pratyakṣam prati āgamasya upajīvya tvam iti atas āha āgamena iti

original: tatropapattivirodhe 'pyanyairliṅgairasya vākyasya prapañcamithyātve tātparyamavagamyatāmityata āha- upakramādīti //

original: puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyata iti svargādiphalānāṃ kṣayitvaśravaṇāt /
analyzed: puṇya citaḥ lokaḥ kṣīyate iti svarga ādi phalānām kṣayi tva śravaṇāt
an evaṃvid mahat puṇyam karma karoti tat eva vīryavattaram bhavati
iti udāhṛta śruti virodhaḥ ca pakṣa dvaye
tat evam ajña pakṣe vākya artha anupapatteḥ upāsaka padasya jñāni upalakṣaka tvam eva yuktam
tathā brahma abhyeti iti śravaṇāt jñāna padasya sākṣātkāra vāci tvam eva yuktam iti
atas eva vākya sāmarthyāt iti uktam
yadi api paśyan api imam ātmānam ityādyāḥ spaṣṭa arthāḥ śrutayaḥ santi
tathā api mīmāṃsā artham etāsām udāharaṇam
nanu ajña pakṣe pi nā anupapattiḥ
upāsakena kṛtāni khalu asaṅkalpita phalāni karmāṇi jñānam upajanayanti
karmaṇā jñānam ātanoti iti śruteḥ
jñānena mokṣaḥ bhavati iti ajña kṛta karmaṇām api jñāna dvāreṇa akṣaya phalatva upapatteḥ iti āśaṅkayā āha jñāna iti
jñāna dvāreṇa ced tasya na asmad pakṣa pratīpa tā
karma phalasya akṣaya tā iti vartate
tasya para kṛta vyākhyānasya
asmad pakṣa pratīpa tā mukta tāratamya virodhi tā
pratyuta tad anukūla tā eva

original: muktau tāratamyamasahamānena khalvevamanyathā vyākhyānaṃ kriyate tanmuktatāratamyameva sādhayati /
analyzed: muktau tāratamyam asahamānena khalu evam anyathā vyākhyānam kriyate tat mukta tāratamyam eva sādhayati
karmāṇi hi jijñāsavaḥ vicitrāṇi kurvanti
taiḥ ca jāyamānena jñānena vicitreṇa eva bhāvyam
anyathā kṛta viprāṇa akṛta abhyāgama āpatte

original: vicitreṇa jñānena vicitra eva mokṣo bhāvanīyaḥ /
analyzed: vicitreṇa jñānena vicitraḥ eva mokṣaḥ bhāvanīyaḥ
pūrva uktāt eva hetoḥ iti
tat evam sva mata virodhi para anukūlam anyathā vyākhyānam na kāryam eva
tathā ca asmad vayākhyāne sthite prakṛtam yuktam iti
astu vā anyathā vyākhyānam yuktam
tatas ca eteṣām vākyānām prakṛta a sādhaka tvam

original: evamapi jñānottarakarmaṇo mokṣāntargataphalahetutāyāḥ pramāṇāntareṇa siddhermuktatāratamyaṃ na hātuṃ śakyamityabhyupagamavādenāha- jñānottarasyeti
analyzed: evam api jñāna uttara karmaṇaḥ mokṣa antargata phala hetutāyāḥ pramāṇa antareṇa siddheḥ mukta tāratamyam na hātum śakyam iti abhyupagama vādena āha jñāna uttarasya iti
jñāna uttarasya evam api hi akṣaya tvam
karmaṇaḥ kṣaya tvam akṣaya mokṣa anupraveśi phala tvam siddhayati
katham iti atas āha na ca iti
na ca anyathā
prakāra antara abhāvāt
pariśeṣa pramāṇāt iti yāvat

original: etena jñānottarasya karmaṇaḥ sāphalye 'pi tasya phalasya mokṣānupraveśitāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvānna mokṣatāratamyasiddhirityapi pratyuktam / *11,303*
analyzed: etena jñāna uttarasya karmaṇaḥ sāphalye tasya phalasya mokṣa anupraveśi tāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt na mokṣa tāratamya siddhiḥ iti api pratyuktam
pariśeṣam eva darśayati pūrvā iti
pūrva bhāvi śubhānām hi jñānena eva kṛtārtha tā
prārabdhānām tu bhogena tad jñāna uttara karmaṇām
muktau anupraveśaḥ syāt anyathā tad kṛtiḥ na hi
jñāni kṛteṣu karmasu etāḥ vidhāḥ tāvat sambhavanti

original: jñānārthatvaṃ vā bhogārthatvaṃ vā vyarthatvaṃ veti /
analyzed: jñāna artha tvam vā bhoga artha tvam vā vyartha tvam vā iti
tatra jñāni karmaṇām jñāna artha tvam tāvat na upapadyate
pūrva bhāvi śabhaiḥ eva jñānasya kṛta tvāt
tatra hetuḥ pūrva bhāvi iti

original: jñānātpūrvabhāvināṃ śubhānāṃ yasamājjñānenaiva kāryeṇa kṛtārthatā nānyena /
analyzed: jñānāt pūrva bhāvinām śubhānām yasamāt jñānena eva kāryeṇa kṛtārtha tā na anyena
teṣām kārya antara abhāvāt
jñāna artha tva abhāve vaiyarthyam syāt iti arthaḥ
pūrva jātam prati paścāt bhāvinaḥ kāraṇa tva ayogāt ca
na api bhoga artha tvam
prācīna prārabdha karmabhiḥ eva bhogasya jāyamāna tvāt

original: tatra hetuḥ prārabdhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ bhogenaiva kṛtārthateti /

pūrvavat tātparyam

a buddhi pūrva tā prasaṅgāt

īśvara vat iti ced na

pūrva bhāvi śubhāni jñāna arthāni iti uktam

original: tatra sarveṣāṃ jñānārthatāyāṃ prasaktāyāṃ viśeṣamāha- jñānādīti //
analyzed: tatra sarveṣām jñāna artha tāyām prasaktāyām viśeṣam āha jñāna ādi iti

akāmyāni

original: jñānātpūrvāṇyakāmyānyeva śubhāni karmāṇi puṇyakarmāṇi jñānasiddhaye bhavanti na tu kāmyāni /
analyzed: jñānāt pūrvāṇi akāmyāni eva śubhāni karmāṇi puṇya karmāṇi jñāna siddhaye bhavanti na tu kāmyāni
śubhāni iti viśeṣaṇasya kṛtyam āha niṣiddhāni iti
niṣiddhāni jñāna rodhāya bhuktaye

bhuktaye duḥkhasya
evam kāmyasya api viniyogaḥ jñātavyaḥ

original: nanu yathākāmyāni śubhānīti ca viśeṣaṇamupādīyate tathā nityanaimittikavyatiriktānītyapi viśeṣaṇamupādeyam /
analyzed: nanu yathā kāmyāni śubhāni iti ca viśeṣaṇam upādīyate tathā nitya naimittika vyatiriktāni iti api viśeṣaṇam upādeyam

original: nityāderapi pratyavāyaparihārāthartvena jñānakāraṇatvābhāvādityata āha- yogyatāyā iti //
analyzed: nitya ādeḥ api jñāna kāraṇa tva abhāvāt iti atas āha yogyatāyāḥ iti
yogya tāyāḥ balāt yat ca śubha bāhulyam āditas
jñāna bāhulyam eva etat kuryāt na anyasya
brāhmaṇa tva ādi rūpā pitṛ maraṇa ādi rūpā ca
āditas jñānāt pūrvam kṛtam
anyasya pratyavāya mātra parihārasya
ādhyānāya prayojana abhāvāt
iti atra asya arthasya samarthita tvāt na iha hetuḥ uktaḥ

original: atra yogyatāyā balācchubhamāditaḥ kṛtametacca jñānameva kuryāditi ca vaktavye yadubhayatra bāhulyagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattasya nāsmatpakṣapratīpatetyuktaprapañcanārthamiti
analyzed: atra yogyatāyāḥ balāt śubham āditas kṛtam etat ca jñānam eva kuryāt iti ca vaktavye yat ubhayatra bāhulya grahaṇam kṛtam tat tasya na asmad pakṣa pratīpa tā iti ukta prapañcana artham iti
atra puruṣa arthaḥ tas śabdāt

original: atra ca karmatāratamyājjñānatāratamyaṃ jñānatāratamyānmokṣatāratamyamiti vadatā ca sūcitam /

original: asmiñchāstre yatra yatra jñānasya mokṣasādhanatvamucyate tatra tatra jñānamiti padena bhaktirīryate lakṣyate /

original: yadyadā jñānasyaiva viśeṣaḥ snehādisāhityalakṣaṇo dharmo bhavati tadā sa piṇḍo bhaktirityabhidhīyate /

original: tatra tamevaṃ vidvāniti parokṣajñānasya mokṣasādhanatve 'bhihite parokṣatvenāparokṣatvaṃ lakṣyata ityarthaḥ /

original: snehayogo 'pi tadvat syād viśeṣo jñānagocaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.200cd //

tatas ekenai
kadeśena eka deśa antara lakṣaṇā ca syāt iti śeṣaḥ

original: lākṣaṇikaprayoge sūtrakārasya kiṃ prayojanamityata āha- ityabhiprāyata iti //

original: bhaktiśabdo māhātmyajñānapūrvakasya snehasya vācaka ityuktaṃ tathā jñānaśabdo bhaktyartha iti /
analyzed: bhakti śabdaḥ māhātmya jñāna pūrvakasya snehasya vācakaḥ iti uktam tathā jñāna śabdaḥ bhakti arthaḥ iti

original: kvāpi bhaktirjñānamiti padābhyāṃ so 'yaṃ snehalakṣaṇo bodhalakṣaṇaśca viśeṣo 'pyudīryate /

original: sahocyate tadā punaruktiprasaṅgādbhaktipadaṃ svārthaikadeśatyāgena snehāṃśasya lakṣakam /

original: ato 'nupapannaṃ lakṣaṇāśrayaṇamityato dveṣasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tāvannirākaroti- na hīti //

original: nanu dveṣāccaidyādayo nṛpā ityādīni dveṣasyāpi mokṣasādhanatāṃ pratipādayanti vākyāni santi /

original: tatkathaṃ dveṣasya muktisādhanatvābhāva ityata āha- smartavya iti //
